7142663Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ExchangeDataDispatcher :Di2015NewLine   IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ExchangeDataDispatcher(ExchangeCommonDataSource parDataSource)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myDataSource = parDataSource;Di2015NewLine        myDataSource.HandleDataReceived += Di2015NewLine            new EventHandler(HandleDataReceived);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DispatcherInitialization();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ExchangeCommonDataSource myDataSource;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void HandleDataReceived(object sender, e EventArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // here you could record statistics or whatever about the dataDi2015NewLine        DispatcherHandleDataReceived(EventArgs);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected abstract void  DispatcherHandleDataReceived(e EventArgs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected abstract void DispatcherShutdown();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // significantly ripped from Microsoft's page on IDisposableDi2015NewLine    private bool disposed = false;Di2015NewLine    protected virtual void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check to see if Dispose has already been called.Di2015NewLine        if(!this.disposed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If disposing equals true, dispose all managedDi2015NewLine            // and unmanaged resources.Di2015NewLine            if(disposing)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // call a function which can be overridden in derivedDi2015NewLine                // classesDi2015NewLine                DispatcherShutdown();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Note disposing has been done.Di2015NewLine            disposed = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7142663Di2015UniqueSeparator// add these to your using statmentsDi2015NewLineusing System.IO.Pipes;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// NOTE: take all the async stuff with a grain of salt; this should give you aDi2015NewLine// basic idea but there's no way I've gotten it right without actually testingDi2015NewLine// and debugging everything. See the link Di2015NewLine// http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6710444/named-pipes-server-read-timeoutDi2015NewLine// for some information on why it has to be done this way: basically timeoutDi2015NewLine// is not supported for named pipe server streams.Di2015NewLinepublic class ExchangeDataLocalMachineDispatcher :Di2015NewLine   ExchangeDataDispatcherDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // see http://www.switchonthecode.com/tutorials/dotnet-35-adds-named-pipes-supportDi2015NewLine    // for some info on named pipes in .NETDi2015NewLine    public ExchangeDataLocalMachineDispatcher(Di2015NewLine        ExchangeCommonDataSource parDataSource, Di2015NewLine        NamedPipeServerStream ServerPipeDi2015NewLine    ) :Di2015NewLine      base(parDataSource)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myPipe = ServerPipe;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // do any extra initialization, etc. here, negotiation for instanceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StartPipeThread();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private NamedPipeServerStream myPipe;Di2015NewLine    private ExchangeCommonDataSource myDataSource;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // assuming you have PipeMessage defined and that your handlerDi2015NewLine    // fills them in.Di2015NewLine    private List<PipeMessage> myOutgoingMessages = Di2015NewLine        new List<PipeMessage>(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Thread myPipeThread;Di2015NewLine    private bool EndPipeListener = false;Di2015NewLine    private AutoResetEvent myWaitEvent = null;Di2015NewLine    private AutoResetEvent myDataReadyToGoEvent = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // set this to something reasonable for the response timeoutDi2015NewLine    private int WaitTimeout = 10000; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // example: at least every minute there should be data to sendDi2015NewLine    private int WaitForDataToSendTimeout = 60000; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void StartPipeThread()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IAsyncResult LastResult = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<IAsyncResult> WaitForResult =Di2015NewLine            (a) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                LastResult = a;Di2015NewLine                myWaitEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        myPipeThread = new System.Threading.ThreadStart(Di2015NewLine        () => Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          tryDi2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine              myWaitEvent = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              myPipe.BeginWaitForConnection(Di2015NewLine                  WaitForResult, nullDi2015NewLine              );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              bool TimedOut = !myWaitEvent.WaitOne(WaitTimeout);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              if (TimedOut || !LastResult.IsCompleted)Di2015NewLine                  throw new Exception("Error: pipe operation error.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              while (!EndPipeListener)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                  byte[] Response = myPipe.BeginRead(Di2015NewLine                     WaitForResult, nullDi2015NewLine                  );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  myWaitEvent.WaitOne(WaitTimeout);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  if (TimedOut || !LastResult.IsCompleted)Di2015NewLine                      throw new Exception("Error: pipe operation error.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  // another assumed function to handle ACKs and suchDi2015NewLine                  HandleResponse(Response);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  myWaitEvent.Set();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  // now wait for data and sendDi2015NewLine                  bool TimedOut = Di2015NewLine                      myDataReadyToGoEvent.WaitOne(WaitForDataToSendTimeout);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  if (TimedOut || !LastResult.IsCompleted)Di2015NewLine                      throw new Exception("Error: no data to send.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  // an assumed function that will pull the messages out ofDi2015NewLine                  // the outgoing message list and send them via the pipeDi2015NewLine                  SendOutgoingMessages();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  myDataReadyToGoEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              myWaitEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          finallyDi2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine              // here you can clean up any resources, for instance you needDi2015NewLine              // to dispose the wait events, you can leave the pipe for theDi2015NewLine              // DispatcherShutdown method to fire in case something elseDi2015NewLine              // wants to handle the error and try again... this is allDi2015NewLine              // fairly naive and should be thought through but I wanted  Di2015NewLine              // to give you some tools you can use.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              // can't remember if you're supposed to use .CloseDi2015NewLine              // .Dispose or both off the top of my head; I think it'sDi2015NewLine              // one or the other.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              myWaitEvent.Dispose();Di2015NewLine              myDataReady.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              myWaitEvent = null;Di2015NewLine              myDataReady = null;     Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected PipeMessage[] ConstructEventMessage(e EventArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // actually we're not using the event args here but I left itDi2015NewLine        // as a placeholder for if were using the derived ones.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Di2015NewLine            PipeMessage.CreateMessagesFromData(Di2015NewLine                myDataSource.GetMessageData()Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void  DispatcherHandleDataReceived(e EventArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create a packet to send out; assuming that the Di2015NewLine        // ConstructEventMessage method is definedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        myOutgoingMessages.Add(ConstructEventMessage(e));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void DispatcherShutdown()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this is called from the base class in the Dispose() methodDi2015NewLine        // you can destroy any remaining resources hereDi2015NewLine        if (myWaitEvent != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            myWaitEvent.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // etc. andDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        myPipe.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // you could theoretically override this method too: if you do, beDi2015NewLine    // sure to call base.Dispose(disposing) so that the base class canDi2015NewLine    // clean up if resources are there to be disposed. Di2015NewLine    // protected virtual void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine    // {Di2015NewLine    //     // do stuffDi2015NewLine    //     base.Dispose(disposing);Di2015NewLine    // }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7142663Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate ExchangeCommonDataSource myData { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// you can also store in something that lets you identify multipleDi2015NewLine// possible data sources; in this case, you could use, say, email addressDi2015NewLine    // as a lookup: myData["mickey@example.com"]; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//private Dictionary<string, ExchangeCommonDataSource> myData =Di2015NewLine//  new Dictionary<string, ExchangeCommonDataSource>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic frmMyMainForm()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ... other initialization for the main form ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create the data here and save it in a private member on yourDi2015NewLine    // form for later; this doesn't have to be in the constructor,Di2015NewLine    // just make sure you save a reference to the source when you Di2015NewLine    // do create your first form that uses the source.Di2015NewLine    myData = new ExchangeCommonDataSource();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// then, in the methods that actually create your formDi2015NewLine// e.g. if creating from a menu item, the handlersDi2015NewLinepublic void FirstFormCreatorMethod()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    frmFirstForm = new frmFirstForm(myData);Di2015NewLine    frmFirstForm.MdiParent = this;Di2015NewLine    frmFirstForm.Show();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void SecondFormCreatorMethod()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    frmSecondForm = new frmSecondForm(myData);Di2015NewLine    frmSecondForm.MdiParent = this;Di2015NewLine    frmSecondForm.Show();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7142663Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic
7142663Di2015UniqueSeparator// a dummy source class; this is just the parts that were relevantDi2015NewLine// to this particular discussion.Di2015NewLinepublic partial class ExchangeCommonDataSourceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Username { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string OptionalString { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int MailboxNumber { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Guid SourceGuid { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public long BigNumber { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // these static members provide the functionality necessary to lookDi2015NewLine    // retrieve an existing source just through the class interface Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this holds the lookup of Guid -> Source for later retreivalDi2015NewLine    static Dictionary<Guid, ExchangeCommonDataSource> allSources = Di2015NewLine            new Dictionary<Guid,ExchangeCommonDataSource>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this factory method looks up whether the source with the passed Di2015NewLine    // Guid already exists; if it does, it returns that, otherwise itDi2015NewLine    // creates the data source and adds it to the lookup tableDi2015NewLine    public static ExchangeCommonDataSource GetConnection(Di2015NewLine            Guid parSourceGuid, string parUsername, long parBigNumberDi2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // there are many issues involved with thread safety, I do notDi2015NewLine        // guarantee that I got it right here, it's to show the idea. :)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // here I'm just providing some thread safety; by placing a lock Di2015NewLine        // around the sources to prevent two separate calls to a factoryDi2015NewLine        // method from each creating a source with the same Guid. Di2015NewLine        lock (allSources)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ExchangeCommonDataSource RetVal;Di2015NewLine            allSources.TryGetValue(parSourceGuid, out RetVal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (RetVal == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // using member initializer, you can do this to limit theDi2015NewLine                // number of constructors; here we only need the one Di2015NewLine                RetVal = new ExchangeCommonDataSource(parSourceGuid) {Di2015NewLine                    Username = parUsername, BigNumber = parBigNumberDi2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                allSources.Add(parSourceGuid, RetVal);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return RetVal;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this function is actually extraneous since the GetConnection Di2015NewLine    // method will either create a new or return an existing source.Di2015NewLine    // if you had need to throw an exception if GetConnection wasDi2015NewLine    // called on for existing source, you could use this to retrieveDi2015NewLine    public static Di2015NewLine        ExchangeCommonDataSource LookupDatasource(Guid parSourceGuid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // again locking the sources lookup for thread-safety. the Di2015NewLine        // rules: 1. don't provide external access to allSourcesDi2015NewLine        //        2. everywhere you use allSources in the class, Di2015NewLine        //           place a lock(allsources { } block around itDi2015NewLine        lock (allSources)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ExchangeCommonDataSource RetVal;Di2015NewLine            allSources.TryGetValue(parSourceGuid, out RetVal);Di2015NewLine            return RetVal;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // private constructor; it is private so we can rely on the Di2015NewLine    // fact that we only provide factory method(s) that insert theDi2015NewLine    // new items into the main dictionaryDi2015NewLine    private ExchangeCommonDataSource(Guid SourceGuid) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if you didn't want to use a factory, you could always doDi2015NewLine        // something like the following without it; note you willDi2015NewLine        // have to throw an error with this implementation because Di2015NewLine        // there's no way to recover. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //lock (allSources)Di2015NewLine        //{Di2015NewLine        //   ExchangeCommonDataSource Existing; Di2015NewLine        //   ExchangeCommonDataSource.allSources.Di2015NewLine        //      TryGetValue(parSourceGuid, out Existing);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //   if (Existing != null)Di2015NewLine        //      throw new Exception("Requested duplicate source!");Di2015NewLine        //}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // ... initialize ...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7143092Di2015UniqueSeparatorImports System.Runtime.CompilerServicesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePublic Module ExtensionsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    <Extension()>Di2015NewLine    Public Function GetAnyControlAt(Panel As TableLayoutPanel, Column As Integer, Row As Integer) As ControlDi2015NewLine        For Each PanelControl As Control In Panel.ControlsDi2015NewLine            With Panel.GetCellPosition(PanelControl)Di2015NewLine                If Column = .Column AndAlso Row = .Row Then Return PanelControlDi2015NewLine            End WithDi2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLine        Return NothingDi2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLineEnd ModuleDi2015NewLine

7143129Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Shuffle<T>(Stack<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Random rng = new Random();Di2015NewLine    T[] elements = source.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    // Note i > 0 to avoid final pointless iterationDi2015NewLine    for (int i = elements.Length - 1; i > 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Swap element "i" with a random earlier element it (or itself)Di2015NewLine        int swapIndex = rng.Next(i + 1);Di2015NewLine        T tmp = elements[i];Di2015NewLine        elements[i] = elements[swapIndex];Di2015NewLine        elements[swapIndex] = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Lazily yield (avoiding aliasing issues etc)Di2015NewLine    foreach (T element in elements)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return element;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7143129Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Shuffle<T>(this Stack<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Random rng = new Random();Di2015NewLine    T[] elements = source.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    source.Clear();Di2015NewLine    // Note i > 0 to avoid final pointless iterationDi2015NewLine    for (int i = elements.Length - 1; i > 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Swap element "i" with a random earlier element it (or itself)Di2015NewLine        int swapIndex = rng.Next(i + 1);Di2015NewLine        T tmp = elements[i];Di2015NewLine        elements[i] = elements[swapIndex];Di2015NewLine        elements[swapIndex] = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (T element in elements)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        source.Push(element);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7147474Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> FirstAndNeighbours<T>(Di2015NewLine  this IEnumerable<T> source,Di2015NewLine  Func<T,bool> predicate,Di2015NewLine  int numOfNeighboursEitherSide)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  using (var enumerator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var precedingNeighbours = new Queue<T>(numOfNeighboursEitherSide);Di2015NewLine    while(enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine      if (predicate(current))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        //We have found the first matching element. First, we must returnDi2015NewLine        //the preceding neighbours.Di2015NewLine        foreach (var precedingNeighbour in precedingNeighbours)Di2015NewLine          yield return precedingNeighbour;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Next, return the matching element.Di2015NewLine        yield return current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Finally, return the succeeding neighbours.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < numOfNeighboursEitherSide; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          if (!enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          yield return enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      //No match yet, keep track of this preceding neighbour.Di2015NewLine      if (precedingNeighbours.Count >= numOfNeighboursEitherSide)Di2015NewLine        precedingNeighbours.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine      precedingNeighbours.Enqueue(current);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Better than Request.IsAuthenticated in that if there's a used-to-be-valid cookie which does not correspond to the current database, it will fail safeDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static bool IsUserAuthenticated()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (HttpContext.Current == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var request = HttpContext.Current.Request;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!request.IsAuthenticated)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var membershipUser = GetCurrentUser();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (membershipUser != null)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7148819Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic public string EncodeTo64(string toEncode)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  byte[] toEncodeAsBytesDi2015NewLine        = System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ASCII.GetBytes(toEncode);Di2015NewLine  string returnValueDi2015NewLine        = System.Convert.ToBase64String(toEncodeAsBytes);Di2015NewLine  return returnValue;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic public string DecodeFrom64(string encodedData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  byte[] encodedDataAsBytesDi2015NewLine      = System.Convert.FromBase64String(encodedData);Di2015NewLine  string returnValue =Di2015NewLine     System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ASCII.GetString(encodedDataAsBytes);Di2015NewLine  return returnValue;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7148819Di2015UniqueSeparator#region EncryptionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string passPhrase = "Pasword";        // can be any stringDi2015NewLine        string saltValue = "sALtValue";        // can be any stringDi2015NewLine        string hashAlgorithm = "SHA1";             // can be "MD5"Di2015NewLine        int passwordIterations = 7;                  // can be any numberDi2015NewLine        string initVector = "~1B2c3D4e5F6g7H8"; // must be 16 bytesDi2015NewLine        int keySize = 256;                // can be 192 or 128Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string Encrypt(string data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] bytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(this.initVector);Di2015NewLine            byte[] rgbSalt = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(this.saltValue);Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(data);Di2015NewLine            byte[] rgbKey = new PasswordDeriveBytes(this.passPhrase, rgbSalt, this.hashAlgorithm, this.passwordIterations).GetBytes(this.keySize / 8);Di2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged managed = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine            managed.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine            ICryptoTransform transform = managed.CreateEncryptor(rgbKey, bytes);Di2015NewLine            MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine            CryptoStream stream2 = new CryptoStream(stream, transform, CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine            stream2.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            stream2.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine            byte[] inArray = stream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            stream.Close();Di2015NewLine            stream2.Close();Di2015NewLine            return Convert.ToBase64String(inArray);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string Decrypt(string data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] bytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(this.initVector);Di2015NewLine            byte[] rgbSalt = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(this.saltValue);Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = Convert.FromBase64String(data);Di2015NewLine            byte[] rgbKey = new PasswordDeriveBytes(this.passPhrase, rgbSalt, this.hashAlgorithm, this.passwordIterations).GetBytes(this.keySize / 8);Di2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged managed = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine            managed.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine            ICryptoTransform transform = managed.CreateDecryptor(rgbKey, bytes);Di2015NewLine            MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream(buffer);Di2015NewLine            CryptoStream stream2 = new CryptoStream(stream, transform, CryptoStreamMode.Read);Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer5 = new byte[buffer.Length];Di2015NewLine            int count = stream2.Read(buffer5, 0, buffer5.Length);Di2015NewLine            stream.Close();Di2015NewLine            stream2.Close();Di2015NewLine            return Encoding.UTF8.GetString(buffer5, 0, count);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine

7154560Di2015UniqueSeparatorint len = line.Length;Di2015NewLinefixed (char* ln = line)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double d;Di2015NewLine    long a = 0, b = 0;Di2015NewLine    int ix = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (ix < len && char.IsNumber(ln[ix]))Di2015NewLine        a = a * 10 + (ln[ix++] - '0');Di2015NewLine    if (ln[ix] == '.')Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ix++;Di2015NewLine        long div = 1;Di2015NewLine        while (ix < len && char.IsNumber(ln[ix]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            b += b * 10 + (ln[ix++] - '0');Di2015NewLine            div *= 10;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        d = a + ((double)b)/div;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (ix < len && char.IsWhiteSpace(ln[ix]))Di2015NewLine        ix++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (ix < len && char.IsNumber(ln[ix]))Di2015NewLine        i = i * 10 + (ln[ix++] - '0');Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7154560Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic int CreateTestData(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    FileStream fstream = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None, 4096, FileOptions.WriteThrough);Di2015NewLine    using (StreamWriter writer = new StreamWriter(fstream, Encoding.UTF8))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < linecount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine("{0} {1}", 1.1d + i, i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return linecount;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic int PrintTestData(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < linecount; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        String.Format("{0} {1}", 1.1d + i, i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return linecount;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7154560Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static unsafe int ParseFast(string data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int count = 0, valid = 0, pos, stop, temp;Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[ushort.MaxValue];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const byte Zero = (byte) '0';Di2015NewLine    const byte Nine = (byte) '9';Di2015NewLine    const byte Dot = (byte)'.';Di2015NewLine    const byte Space = (byte)' ';Di2015NewLine    const byte Tab = (byte) '\\t';Di2015NewLine    const byte Line = (byte) '\\n';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    fixed (byte *ptr = buffer)Di2015NewLine    using (Stream reader = File.OpenRead(data))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (0 != (temp = reader.Read(buffer, valid, buffer.Length - valid)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            valid += temp;Di2015NewLine            pos = 0;Di2015NewLine            stop = Math.Min(buffer.Length - 1024, valid);Di2015NewLine            while (pos < stop)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                double d;Di2015NewLine                long a = 0, b = 0;Di2015NewLine                while (pos < valid && ptr[pos] >= Zero && ptr[pos] <= Nine)Di2015NewLine                    a = a*10 + (ptr[pos++] - Zero);Di2015NewLine                if (ptr[pos] == Dot)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pos++;Di2015NewLine                    long div = 1;Di2015NewLine                    while (pos < valid && ptr[pos] >= Zero && ptr[pos] <= Nine)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        b += b*10 + (ptr[pos++] - Zero);Di2015NewLine                        div *= 10;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    d = a + ((double) b)/div;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    d = a;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (pos < valid && (ptr[pos] == Space || ptr[pos] == Tab))Di2015NewLine                    pos++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int i = 0;Di2015NewLine                while (pos < valid && ptr[pos] >= Zero && ptr[pos] <= Nine)Di2015NewLine                    i = i*10 + (ptr[pos++] - Zero);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                DoSomething(d, i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (pos < stop && ptr[pos] != Line)Di2015NewLine                    pos++;Di2015NewLine                while (pos < stop && !(ptr[pos] >= Zero && ptr[pos] <= Nine))Di2015NewLine                    pos++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (pos < valid)Di2015NewLine                Buffer.BlockCopy(buffer, pos, buffer, 0, valid - pos);Di2015NewLine            valid -= pos;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7157845Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void FillChart()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // fill the data table with valuesDi2015NewLine    var dt = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add("Id", typeof(int));Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add("City", typeof(string));Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add("State", typeof(string));Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add("Population", typeof(int));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    dt.Rows.Add(0, "City1", "State1", 100);Di2015NewLine    dt.Rows.Add(1, "City2", "State1", 30);Di2015NewLine    dt.Rows.Add(2, "City3", "State1", 40);Di2015NewLine    dt.Rows.Add(3, "City1", "State2", 80);Di2015NewLine    dt.Rows.Add(4, "City2", "State2", 70);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // bind the data table to chartDi2015NewLine    this.chart1.Series.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var series = this.chart1.Series.Add("Series 1");Di2015NewLine    series.XValueMember = "Id";Di2015NewLine    series.YValueMembers = "Population";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    series.ChartType = SeriesChartType.Column;Di2015NewLine    this.chart1.DataSource = dt;Di2015NewLine    this.chart1.DataBind();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // custom labels Di2015NewLine    foreach (var g in dt.AsEnumerable().GroupBy(x => x.Field<string>("State")))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string state = g.Key;Di2015NewLine        var cities = g.Select(r => new { Id = r.Field<int>("Id"), City = r.Field<string>("City") });Di2015NewLine        // find min-maxDi2015NewLine        int min = cities.Min(y => y.Id);Di2015NewLine        int max = cities.Max(y => y.Id);Di2015NewLine        // city labelsDi2015NewLine        foreach (var city in cities)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var label = new CustomLabel(city.Id - 1, city.Id + 1, city.City, 0, LabelMarkStyle.None);Di2015NewLine            this.chart1.ChartAreas[0].AxisX.CustomLabels.Add(label);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // city statesDi2015NewLine        var statelabel = new CustomLabel(min, max, state, 1, LabelMarkStyle.LineSideMark);Di2015NewLine        this.chart1.ChartAreas[0].AxisX.CustomLabels.Add(statelabel);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7157892Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IBinarySerializableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void Serialize(BinaryWriter writer);Di2015NewLine    void Deserialize(BinaryReader reader);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class BinaryReaderWriterExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Write(this BinaryWriter writer, IBinarySerializable value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        value.Serialize(writer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T Read<T>(this BinaryReader reader)Di2015NewLine        where T : IBinarySerializable, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var val = new T();Di2015NewLine        val.Deserialize(reader);Di2015NewLine        return val;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ReadInto(this BinaryReader reader, IBinarySerializable value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        value.Deserialize(reader);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void WriteList<T>(this BinaryWriter writer, IList<T> list, Action<BinaryWriter, T> singleValueWriter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.Write(list.Count);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in list)Di2015NewLine            singleValueWriter(writer, item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> ReadList<T>(this BinaryReader reader, Func<BinaryReader, T> singleValueReader)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ct = reader.ReadInt32();Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < ct; i++)Di2015NewLine            yield return singleValueReader(reader);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class WantsToBeSerialized : IBinarySerializableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int ID;Di2015NewLine    public string CustomerName;Di2015NewLine    public List<string> Nicknames;Di2015NewLine    public SomeOtherSerializableObject Thing;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void IBinarySerializable.Serialize(BinaryWriter writer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.Write(ID);Di2015NewLine        writer.Write(CustomerName);Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteList(Nicknames, (w, value) => w.Write(value));Di2015NewLine        writer.Write(Thing);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void IBinarySerializable.Deserialize(BinaryReader reader)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ID = reader.ReadInt32();Di2015NewLine        CustomerName = reader.ReadString();Di2015NewLine        Nicknames = new List<string>(reader.ReadList(x => x.ReadString()));Di2015NewLine        Thing = reader.Read<SomeOtherSerializableObject>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7157969Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid SetShortToBuffer(short val,byte[] outArray,int Offset)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    outArray[Offset] = (byte)(val & 0x00FF);Di2015NewLine    Offset++;Di2015NewLine    outArray[Offset] = (byte)((val >> 8) & 0x00FF);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebyte[] ConvertShortArray(short[] Data,int Offset,int Count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] helper = new byte[Count * sizeof(short)];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int end = Offset+Count;Di2015NewLine    int io=0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = Offset; i < end; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SetShortToBuffer(Data[i], helper, io);Di2015NewLine        io+=sizeof(short);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return helper; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7157969Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[] CreateWaveFileHeader(int SizeOfData, short ChannelCount, uint SamplesPerSecond, short BitsPerSample)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    short BlockAlign = (short)(ChannelCount * (BitsPerSample / 8));Di2015NewLine    uint AverageBytesPerSecond = SamplesPerSecond * BlockAlign;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<byte> pom = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLine    pom.AddRange(ASCIIEncoding.ASCII.GetBytes("RIFF"));Di2015NewLine    pom.AddRange(BitConverter.GetBytes(SizeOfData + 36)); //Size + up to dataDi2015NewLine    pom.AddRange(ASCIIEncoding.ASCII.GetBytes("WAVEfmt "));Di2015NewLine    pom.AddRange(BitConverter.GetBytes(((uint)16))); //16 For PCMDi2015NewLine    pom.AddRange(BitConverter.GetBytes(((short)1))); //PCM FMTDi2015NewLine    pom.AddRange(BitConverter.GetBytes(((short)ChannelCount)));Di2015NewLine    pom.AddRange(BitConverter.GetBytes((uint)SamplesPerSecond));Di2015NewLine    pom.AddRange(BitConverter.GetBytes((uint)AverageBytesPerSecond));Di2015NewLine    pom.AddRange(BitConverter.GetBytes((short)BlockAlign));Di2015NewLine    pom.AddRange(BitConverter.GetBytes((short)BitsPerSample));Di2015NewLine    pom.AddRange(ASCIIEncoding.ASCII.GetBytes("data"));Di2015NewLine    pom.AddRange(BitConverter.GetBytes(SizeOfData));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return pom.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7159363Di2015UniqueSeparator    // Returns the node with the first hit, or null if noneDi2015NewLine    public TreeNode Search(TreeView treeView, string text)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        return SearchNodes(treeView.Nodes, text);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Recursive text search depth-first.Di2015NewLine    private TreeNode SearchNodes(TreeNodeCollection nodes, string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (TreeNode node in nodes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (node.Text.Contains(text)) return node;Di2015NewLine            var subSearchHit = SearchNodes(node.Nodes, text);Di2015NewLine            if (subSearchHit != null) return subSearchHit;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7160061Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Guid NewSystemGuid(int machine)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (machine < 0 | machine > 0xF)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("machine");Di2015NewLine    var g = Guid.NewGuid();Di2015NewLine    var arr = g.ToByteArray();Di2015NewLine    arr[7] = (byte)((machine << 4) | (arr[7] & 0xF));Di2015NewLine    return new Guid(arr);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic int ExtractMachine(Guid guid)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var arr = guid.ToByteArray();Di2015NewLine    return (arr[7] >> 4) & 0xF;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7160061Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Guid NewSystemGuid(int machine)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (machine < 0 | machine > 0xFF)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("machine");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var m1 = machine & 0xF;Di2015NewLine    var m2 = (machine >> 4) & 0xF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var g = Guid.NewGuid();Di2015NewLine    var arr = g.ToByteArray();Di2015NewLine    arr[7] = (byte)((m1 << 4) | (arr[7] & 0xF));Di2015NewLine    arr[8] = (byte)((m2 << 4) | (arr[8] & 0xF));Di2015NewLine    return new Guid(arr);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic int ExtractMachine(Guid guid)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var arr = guid.ToByteArray();Di2015NewLine    return Di2015NewLine        ((arr[7] >> 4) & 0xF) |Di2015NewLine        (((arr[8] >> 4) & 0xF) << 4);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7160061Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Guid NewSystemGuid(int machine)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (machine < 0 | machine > 0x3F)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("machine");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var m1 = machine & 0xF;Di2015NewLine    var m2 = (machine >> 4) & 0xF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var g = Guid.NewGuid();Di2015NewLine    var arr = g.ToByteArray();Di2015NewLine    arr[7] = (byte)((m1 << 4) | (arr[7] & 0xF));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var y = (arr[8] >> 4) & 0xF;Di2015NewLine    switch (y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case 0x8:Di2015NewLine            arr[8] = (byte)((m2 << 4) | (arr[8] & 0xF));Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 0x9:Di2015NewLine            arr[8] = (byte)(((m2 | 0x8) << 4) | (arr[8] & 0xF));Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 0xA:Di2015NewLine            arr[8] = (byte)(((m2 | 0x4) << 4) | (arr[8] & 0xF));Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 0xB:Di2015NewLine            arr[8] = (byte)(((m2 | 0xC) << 4) | (arr[8] & 0xF));Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new Guid(arr);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic int ExtractMachine(Guid guid)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var arr = guid.ToByteArray();Di2015NewLine    return Di2015NewLine        ((arr[7] >> 4) & 0xF) |Di2015NewLine        (((arr[8] >> 4) & 0x3) << 4);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7160061Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass SequentialGuidDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("rpcrt4.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    static extern int UuidCreateSequential(out Guid guid); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Guid NewGuid()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Guid guid;Di2015NewLine        UuidCreateSequential(out guid);Di2015NewLine        return guid;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static byte[] ExtractMacAddress(Guid guid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var arr = guid.ToByteArray();Di2015NewLine        // Require version 1.Di2015NewLine        if (((arr[7] >> 4) & 0xF) != 1)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("guid", "GUID is required to be a sequential (version 1) GUID.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var macLong = BitConverter.ToInt64(arr, arr.Length - 8);Di2015NewLine        macLong = IPAddress.NetworkToHostOrder(macLong);Di2015NewLine        arr = BitConverter.GetBytes(macLong);Di2015NewLine        Array.Resize(ref arr, 6);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return arr;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7161481Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace RijndaelManaged_ExamplesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class RijndaelMemoryExampleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string original = "Here is some data to encrypt!";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Create a new instance of the RijndaelManagedDi2015NewLine                // class.  This generates a new key and initialization Di2015NewLine                // vector (IV).Di2015NewLine                RijndaelManaged myRijndael = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Encrypt the string to an array of bytes.Di2015NewLine                byte[] encrypted = encryptStringToBytes_AES(original, myRijndael.Key, myRijndael.IV);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Decrypt the bytes to a string.Di2015NewLine                string roundtrip = decryptStringFromBytes_AES(encrypted, myRijndael.Key, myRijndael.IV);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Display the original data and the decrypted data.Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Original:   {0}", original);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Round Trip: {0}", roundtrip);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Error: {0}", e.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static byte[] encryptStringToBytes_AES(string plainText, byte[] Key, byte[] IV)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Check arguments.Di2015NewLine            if (plainText == null || plainText.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("plainText");Di2015NewLine            if (Key == null || Key.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("Key");Di2015NewLine            if (IV == null || IV.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("Key");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Declare the streams usedDi2015NewLine            // to encrypt to an in memoryDi2015NewLine            // array of bytes.Di2015NewLine            MemoryStream    msEncrypt   = null;Di2015NewLine            CryptoStream    csEncrypt   = null;Di2015NewLine            StreamWriter    swEncrypt   = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Declare the RijndaelManaged objectDi2015NewLine            // used to encrypt the data.Di2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged aesAlg      = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create a RijndaelManaged objectDi2015NewLine                // with the specified key and IV.Di2015NewLine                aesAlg = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine                aesAlg.Key = Key;Di2015NewLine                aesAlg.IV = IV;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Create a decrytor to perform the stream transform.Di2015NewLine                ICryptoTransform encryptor = aesAlg.CreateEncryptor(aesAlg.Key, aesAlg.IV);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Create the streams used for encryption.Di2015NewLine                msEncrypt = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine                csEncrypt = new CryptoStream(msEncrypt, encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine                swEncrypt = new StreamWriter(csEncrypt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Write all data to the stream.Di2015NewLine                swEncrypt.Write(plainText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Clean things up.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Close the streams.Di2015NewLine                if(swEncrypt != null)Di2015NewLine                    swEncrypt.Close();Di2015NewLine                if (csEncrypt != null)Di2015NewLine                    csEncrypt.Close();Di2015NewLine                if (msEncrypt != null)Di2015NewLine                    msEncrypt.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Clear the RijndaelManaged object.Di2015NewLine                if (aesAlg != null)Di2015NewLine                    aesAlg.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Return the encrypted bytes from the memory stream.Di2015NewLine            return msEncrypt.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static string decryptStringFromBytes_AES(byte[] cipherText, byte[] Key, byte[] IV)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Check arguments.Di2015NewLine            if (cipherText == null || cipherText.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("cipherText");Di2015NewLine            if (Key == null || Key.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("Key");Di2015NewLine            if (IV == null || IV.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("Key");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // TDeclare the streams usedDi2015NewLine            // to decrypt to an in memoryDi2015NewLine            // array of bytes.Di2015NewLine            MemoryStream    msDecrypt   = null;Di2015NewLine            CryptoStream    csDecrypt   = null;Di2015NewLine            StreamReader    srDecrypt   = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Declare the RijndaelManaged objectDi2015NewLine            // used to decrypt the data.Di2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged aesAlg      = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Declare the string used to holdDi2015NewLine            // the decrypted text.Di2015NewLine            string plaintext = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create a RijndaelManaged objectDi2015NewLine                // with the specified key and IV.Di2015NewLine                aesAlg = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine                aesAlg.Key = Key;Di2015NewLine                aesAlg.IV = IV;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Create a decrytor to perform the stream transform.Di2015NewLine                ICryptoTransform decryptor = aesAlg.CreateDecryptor(aesAlg.Key, aesAlg.IV);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Create the streams used for decryption.Di2015NewLine                msDecrypt = new MemoryStream(cipherText);Di2015NewLine                csDecrypt = new CryptoStream(msDecrypt, decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read);Di2015NewLine                srDecrypt = new StreamReader(csDecrypt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Read the decrypted bytes from the decrypting streamDi2015NewLine                // and place them in a string.Di2015NewLine                plaintext = srDecrypt.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Clean things up.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Close the streams.Di2015NewLine                if (srDecrypt != null)Di2015NewLine                    srDecrypt.Close();Di2015NewLine                if (csDecrypt != null)Di2015NewLine                    csDecrypt.Close();Di2015NewLine                if (msDecrypt != null)Di2015NewLine                    msDecrypt.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Clear the RijndaelManaged object.Di2015NewLine                if (aesAlg != null)Di2015NewLine                    aesAlg.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return plaintext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7163583Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<String> GetUnique(IEnumerable<String> list) {Di2015NewLine    HashSet<String> itms = new HashSet<String>();Di2015NewLine    foreach(string itm in list) {Di2015NewLine         string itr = itm;Di2015NewLine         while(itms.Contains(itr)) {Di2015NewLine             itr = itr + "_";Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         itms.Add(itr);Di2015NewLine         yield return itr;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7163586Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DecimalExDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static decimal Fix(this decimal value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var x = value;Di2015NewLine        var i = 28;Di2015NewLine        while (i > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var t = decimal.Round(x, i);Di2015NewLine            if (t != x)Di2015NewLine                return x;Di2015NewLine            x = t;Di2015NewLine            i--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return x;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7164616Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerator<T>
7164616Di2015UniqueSeparatorComparer<T>.Default
7164616Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> IntersectSorted<T>(this IEnumerable<T> sequence1,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> sequence2,Di2015NewLine    IComparer<T> comparer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var cursor1 = sequence1.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    using (var cursor2 = sequence2.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!cursor1.MoveNext() || !cursor2.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var value1 = cursor1.Current;Di2015NewLine        var value2 = cursor2.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int comparison = comparer.Compare(value1, value2);Di2015NewLine            if (comparison < 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!cursor1.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                value1 = cursor1.Current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (comparison > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!cursor2.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                value2 = cursor2.Current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return value1;Di2015NewLine                if (!cursor1.MoveNext() || !cursor2.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                value1 = cursor1.Current;Di2015NewLine                value2 = cursor2.Current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7167614Di2015UniqueSeparatorX509Certificate2
7167614Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string EncryptString(string clearText, X509Certificate2 cert)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] encodedCypher = EncryptData(Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(clearText), cert);Di2015NewLine        string cipherText = Convert.ToBase64String(encodedCypher);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return cipherText;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new EncryptionException("Could not Encrypt String. See InnerException for details.", ex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static byte[] EncryptData(byte[] clearText, X509Certificate2 cert)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ContentInfo payloadInfo = new ContentInfo(clearText);Di2015NewLine    EnvelopedCms payloadEnvelope = new EnvelopedCms(payloadInfo);Di2015NewLine    CmsRecipient certHandle = new CmsRecipient(cert);Di2015NewLine    payloadEnvelope.Encrypt(certHandle);Di2015NewLine    return payloadEnvelope.Encode();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7171858Di2015UniqueSeparator// Main():Di2015NewLine// Set up the stackDi2015NewLine00000000  push        ebp                    // Save the base pointerDi2015NewLine00000001  mov         ebp,esp                // Set up stack pointerDi2015NewLine00000003  sub         esp,8                  // Reserve space for local variablesDi2015NewLine00000006  xor         eax,eax                // Zero out the EAX registerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Copy the object reference to the local variable `temp` (I /think/)Di2015NewLine00000008  mov         dword ptr [ebp-4],eax  // Copy its content to memory (temp)Di2015NewLine0000000b  mov         dword ptr [ebp-8],ecx  // Copy ECX (where'd it come from??)Di2015NewLine0000000e  cmp         dword ptr ds:[00318D5Ch],0  // Compare this against zeroDi2015NewLine00000015  je          0000001C               // Jump if it was null (?)Di2015NewLine00000017  call        6F910029               // (Calls some internal method, idk)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// THIS is where our code finally starts runningDi2015NewLine0000001c  mov         eax,dword ptr [ebp-8]  // Copy the reference to registerDi2015NewLine0000001f  mov         dword ptr [ebp-4],eax  // ** COPY it AGAIN to memoryDi2015NewLine00000022  lea         ecx,[ebp-4]            // ** Take the ADDRESS of the copyDi2015NewLine00000025  call        dword ptr ds:[00319734h] // Call the methodDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// We're done with the callDi2015NewLine0000002b  nop                                // Do nothing (why?)Di2015NewLine0000002c  mov         esp,ebp                // Restore stackDi2015NewLine0000002e  pop         ebp                    // EpilogueDi2015NewLine0000002f  ret                                // ReturnDi2015NewLine

7172626Di2015UniqueSeparatoradbul
7172698Di2015UniqueSeparatorTcpClient
7172698Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetStream
7172698Di2015UniqueSeparatorNetworkStream
7172698Di2015UniqueSeparatorBeginRead
7172698Di2015UniqueSeparatorSocket
7172698Di2015UniqueSeparatorBeginReceive
7172698Di2015UniqueSeparatorNetworkStream
7172698Di2015UniqueSeparatorSocket
7172698Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[] readBuffer = new byte[1000]; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TcpClient tcpClient = new TcpClient(serverHost, serverPort);Di2015NewLine    NetworkStream stream = tcpClient.GetStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    stream.BeginRead(readBuffer, 0, 1000, readHandler, tcpClient);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebyte[] tempBuff = new byte[1000];Di2015NewLineint tempBuffSize = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This is a rough example of reading and handling dataDi2015NewLine// that is delimited by \\r\\n. This code most probably isDi2015NewLine// missing many edge case handling, so use it only as a startingDi2015NewLine// pointDi2015NewLinevoid readHandler(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TcpClient tcpClient = (TcpClient)result.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine    int dataLen = tcpClient.GetStream().EndRead();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int currStart = 0;Di2015NewLine    int currEnd = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < dataLen; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (readBuffer[i] == '\\r' && i < (readBuffer.Length - 1) &&Di2015NewLine            readBuffer[i + 1] == '\\n')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Set the end of the dataDi2015NewLine            currEnd = i - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If we have left overs from previous runs:Di2015NewLine            if (tempBuffSize != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Allocate enough space for the joined bufferDi2015NewLine                byte[] joinedData = new byte[tempBuffSize + (currEnd - currStart + 1)];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Get the leftover from the previous readDi2015NewLine                Array.Copy(tempBuff, 0, joinedData, 0, tempBuffSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // And add the current read as wellDi2015NewLine                Array.Copy(readBuffer, currStart, joinedData, tempBuffSize, (currEnd - currStart + 1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Now handle itDi2015NewLine                HandleData(joinedData, 0, joinedData.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Mark that we don't have any leftovers anymoreDi2015NewLine                tempBuffSize = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {               Di2015NewLine                // Handle the data, from the start to the end, between delimiterDi2015NewLine                HandleData(readBuffer, currStart, currEnd);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Set the new start - after our delimiterDi2015NewLine            currStart = i + 2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // See if we still have any leftoversDi2015NewLine    if (currStart < dataLen)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(readBuffer, currStart, tempBuff, 0, dataLen - currStart);Di2015NewLine        tempBuffSize = dataLen - currStart;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set the asynchronous read againDi2015NewLine    stream.BeginRead(readBuffer, 0, 1000, readHandler, tcpClient);Di2015NewLine}   Di2015NewLine

7174386Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Write(DataTable dt, string outputFilePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] maxLengths = new int[dt.Columns.Count];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < dt.Columns.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            maxLengths[i] = dt.Columns[i].ColumnName.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (DataRow row in dt.Rows)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!row.IsNull(i))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int length = row[i].ToString().Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (length > maxLengths[i])Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        maxLengths[i] = length;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(outputFilePath, false))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < dt.Columns.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sw.Write(dt.Columns[i].ColumnName.PadRight(maxLengths[i] + 2));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sw.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (DataRow row in dt.Rows)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < dt.Columns.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!row.IsNull(i))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        sw.Write(row[i].ToString().PadRight(maxLengths[i] + 2));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        sw.Write(new string(' ', maxLengths[i] + 2));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                sw.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sw.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7175754Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TimerWrapperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private object defaultLock = new object();Di2015NewLine    private object functionLock = null;Di2015NewLine    private object classLock = new object();Di2015NewLine    protected bool isRunning = false;Di2015NewLine    protected bool isRepeating = false;Di2015NewLine    protected Timer timer = null;Di2015NewLine    protected Action timerFn = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TimerWrapper(Action timerFn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (timerFn == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("timerFn", "Invalid timer delegate supplied at construction");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Execute this function upon expiration of the timerDi2015NewLine        this.timerFn = timerFn;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TimerWrapper(Action timerFn, ref object timerLock) : this(timerFn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Use the locking object passed at constructionDi2015NewLine        this.functionLock = timerLock;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void TimerFunction(object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (timerFn != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (classLock)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Lock on function lock if available or default lock otherwiseDi2015NewLine                lock (functionLock ?? defaultLock)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // If timer isn't repeating it's now no longer runningDi2015NewLine                    if (!IsRepeating)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        IsRunning = false;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Execute this function because timer has expiredDi2015NewLine                    timerFn();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Stop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (classLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (timer != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                timer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                timer = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IsRunning = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start(int duetime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Start the timer for a single runDi2015NewLine        Start(duetime, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start(int duetime, int period)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (duetime > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (classLock)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Stop the timerDi2015NewLine                Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Start the timer for either a single run or repeated runsDi2015NewLine                timer = new }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsRepeatingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return MoveSpeed = 5.0f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (e.KeyCode)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case Keys.Q:Di2015NewLine                    imageRotation -= 1.0f;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Keys.E:Di2015NewLine                    imageRotation += 1.0f;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Keys.Up:Di2015NewLine                    imageTranslation = new PointF(imageTranslation.X - (float)Math.Sin(imageRotation / 180 * Math.PI) * MoveSpeed, imageTranslation.Y - (float)Math.Cos(imageRotation / 180 * Math.PI) * MoveSpeed);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Keys.Down:Di2015NewLine                    imageTranslation = new 7178532Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BaseClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public virtual void A() { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual void B() { }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SubClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // COMPILER ERROR, can't override to be more restrictive accessDi2015NewLine    private override void A() { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // LEGAL, you can HIDE the base class method, but which is chosen Di2015NewLine    // depends on level accessed fromDi2015NewLine    private new void B() { }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7178532Di2015UniqueSeparatorSubClass.B()
7178532Di2015UniqueSeparatorSubClass.B()
7178532Di2015UniqueSeparatorSubClass
7178532Di2015UniqueSeparatorB()
7178532Di2015UniqueSeparatorB()
7178532Di2015UniqueSeparatorBaseClass.B()
7178532Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BaseClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public virtual void A() { }Di2015NewLine    public virtual void B() { }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SubClass : BaseClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public virtual void A() { B(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // legal, you can do this and B() is now hidden internally in SubClass,Di2015NewLine    // but to outside world BaseClass's B() is still the one used.Di2015NewLine    private new void B() { }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSubClass sc = new SubClass();Di2015NewLineBaseClass bc = new BaseClass();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// both of these call BaseClass.B() because we are outside of class and can'tDi2015NewLine// see the hide SubClass.B().Di2015NewLinesc.B();Di2015NewLinebc.B();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// this calls SubClass.A(), which WILL call SubClass.B() because the hideDi2015NewLine// SubClass.B() is visible within SubClass, and thus the hide hides BaseClass.B()Di2015NewLine// for any calls inside of SubClass.Di2015NewLinesc.A();Di2015NewLine

7184146Di2015UniqueSeparator    public bool ContainsGroup(string file)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = new StreamReader(file))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var hasAction = false;Di2015NewLine            var hasInput = false;Di2015NewLine            var hasResult = false;Di2015NewLine            while (!reader.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var line = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                if (!hasAction)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (line.StartsWith("ACTION:"))Di2015NewLine                        hasAction = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (!hasInput)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (line.StartsWith("INPUT:"))Di2015NewLine                        hasInput = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (!hasResult)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (line.StartsWith("RESULT:"))Di2015NewLine                        hasResult = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (hasAction && hasInput && hasResult)Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7187199Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Match(int matchId) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // You called constructor yourselves = you have unproxied entity withoutDi2015NewLine    // dynamic change tracking and without lazy loadingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Id = matchId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // I'm not sure if this is possible in entity constructor but generally it should workDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get context somewhere - service locator patternDi2015NewLine    ObjectContext context = ContextProvider.GetCurrent();Di2015NewLine    context.Matches.Attach(this);Di2015NewLine    context.Refresh(RefreshMode.StoreWins, this);Di2015NewLine    // Now you should have populated Match entity itself but not its navigation propertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // To populate relations you must call separate query for each of them because `Include`Di2015NewLine    // is possible only when the entity is created and loaded by EF and lazy loading is offDi2015NewLine    // in this caseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    context.LoadProperty(this, m => m.TeamA);Di2015NewLine    context.LoadProperty(this, m => m.TeamB);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Season = (from s in context.Seasons.Include("Competition")Di2015NewLine              select s).ToList();      Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7190575Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Resize the image to the specified width and height.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="image">The image to resize.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="width">The width to resize to.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="height">The height to resize to.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The resized image.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static System.Drawing.Bitmap ResizeImage(System.Drawing.Image image, int width, int height)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //a holder for the resultDi2015NewLine        Bitmap result = new Bitmap(width, height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //use a graphics object to draw the resized image into the bitmapDi2015NewLine        using (Graphics graphics = Graphics.FromImage(result))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //set the resize quality modes to high qualityDi2015NewLine            graphics.CompositingQuality = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingQuality.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine            graphics.InterpolationMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine            graphics.SmoothingMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.SmoothingMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine            //draw the image into the target bitmapDi2015NewLine            graphics.DrawImage(image, 0, 0, result.Width, result.Height);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //return the resulting bitmapDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7191767Di2015UniqueSeparator@"(\\r[^\\n])|([^\\r]\\n)"
7191767Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLinepublic class TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        public static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                Regex r = new Regex(@"(\\r[^\\n])|([^\\r]\\n)");Di2015NewLine                string[] Test = { "Hello,\\r\\n\\r\\nWelcome on board of our brand-new cruise line.\\r\\nKind regards", Di2015NewLine                                         "Hello\\r\\r\\nWelcom on board of our brand-new cruise line.\\nKind regards" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach(string t in Test)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                        System.Console.Write("\\"{0}\\" ", t.Replace("\\r", "\\\\r").Replace("\\n", "\\\\n"));Di2015NewLine                        if(r.IsMatch(t))Di2015NewLine                                System.Console.WriteLine("Is not ok");Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                                System.Console.WriteLine("Is ok");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7195676Di2015UniqueSeparator// first wait until readyDi2015NewLinebyte status;Di2015NewLinedoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  status = Ring0.ReadIoPort(BASE_ADDRESS + HOST_STAT_REG);Di2015NewLine} while ((status & HOST_BUSY) > 0);Di2015NewLineif ((status & 0x1E) != 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Ring0.WriteIoPort(BASE_ADDRESS + HOST_STAT_REG, status);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// now get the valueDi2015NewLineRing0.WriteIoPort(BASE_ADDRESS + HOST_DATA_0_REG, 0);Di2015NewLineRing0.WriteIoPort(BASE_ADDRESS + HOST_COMM_REG, theRegister)Di2015NewLineRing0.WriteIoPort(BASE_ADDRESS + T_SLAVE_ADR_REG, Di2015NewLine            (byte)((SLAVE_ADDRESS << 1) | READ));Di2015NewLineRing0.WriteIoPort(BASE_ADDRESS + HOST_CTRL_REG,Di2015NewLine            START_COMM | BYTE_DATA_COMM);Di2015NewLineRing0.ReadIoPort(BASE_ADDRESS + HOST_DATA_0_REGISTER); // this returns the valueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// now wait for it to endDi2015NewLinewhile ((Ring0.ReadIoPort(BASE_ADDRESS + HOST_STAT_REG) & HOST_BUSY) > 0) {}Di2015NewLine

HideRestoreNodesForm : FormDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private List<RemovedTreeNode> _removedNodes = new List<RemovedTreeNode>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public HideRestoreNodesForm()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //AddNodesToTree();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void searchButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TreeNode[] foundNodes = treeView1.Nodes.Find("NameOfNodeToFind", true);Di2015NewLine            if(foundNodes.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TreeNode foundNode = foundNodes[0];Di2015NewLine                HideNodes(treeView1.Nodes, foundNode);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void HideNodes(TreeNodeCollection nodes, TreeNode visibleNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<TreeNode> nodesToRemove = new List<TreeNode>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (TreeNode node in nodes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!AreNodesRelated(node, visibleNode))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _removedNodes.Add(new RemovedTreeNode() { RemovedNode = node, ParentNode = node.Parent, RemovedNodeIndex = node.Index });Di2015NewLine                    nodesToRemove.Add(node);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    HideNodes(node.Nodes, visibleNode);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (TreeNode node in nodesToRemove)Di2015NewLine                node.Remove();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool AreNodesRelated(TreeNode firstNode, TreeNode secondNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!IsNodeAncestor(firstNode, secondNode) && !IsNodeAncestor(secondNode, firstNode) && firstNode != secondNode)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool IsNodeAncestor(TreeNode nodeToCheck, TreeNode descendantNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TreeNode parentNode = descendantNode.Parent;Di2015NewLine            while (parentNode != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (parentNode == nodeToCheck)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    parentNode = parentNode.Parent;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void restoreNodes_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RestoreNodes();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void RestoreNodes()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class RemovedTreeNodeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public TreeNode RemovedNode { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int 7207928Di2015UniqueSeparator// create the tableDi2015NewLinestring commandString  = "CREATE TABLE ...";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// run the command in a transaction and commit mtransaction);Di2015NewLinecommand.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLinetransaction.Commit();Di2015NewLinetransaction.Dispose();Di2015NewLinetransaction = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// copy the data to the new table from the oldDi2015NewLinecommandString = "INSERT INTO ...";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemtransaction = Connection.BeginTransaction(IsolationLevel.Serializable);Di2015NewLineFbCommand command = new FbCommand(commandString, Connection, mtransaction);Di2015NewLinecommand.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLinetransaction.Commit();Di2015NewLinetransaction.Dispose();Di2015NewLinetransaction = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ------------------  Di2015NewLine// Drop the connection entirely and start a new oneDi2015NewLine// so the table can be dropped Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConnection.Close();Di2015NewLineConnection.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// build connection string Di2015NewLineFbConnectionStringBuilder csb = new FbConnectionStringBuilder();Di2015NewLinecsb.DataSource ... etc...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// connectDi2015NewLineConnection = new FbConnection(connectionString);Di2015NewLineConnection.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now have new connection that does not have weirdDi2015NewLine// lingering query, and table can now be droppedDi2015NewLine// -----------------Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// drop the old tableDi2015NewLinecommandString = "DROP TABLE ...";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemtransaction = mtransaction);Di2015NewLinecommand.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// this no longer fails because the connection was complete closedDi2015NewLine// and re-openedDi2015NewLinetransaction.Commit();Di2015NewLinetransaction.Dispose();Di2015NewLinetransaction = null;Di2015NewLine
