7209655Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string text = "Hello, how are you?";Di2015NewLine    List<SplitDefinition> splitDefinitionList = CustomSplit(text, new char[] { 'h', 'o' });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic List<SplitDefinition> CustomSplit(string source, char[] delimiters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<SplitDefinition> splitDefinitionList = new List<SplitDefinition>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(char d in delimiters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SplitDefinition sd = new SplitDefinition(d, source.Split(d));           Di2015NewLine        splitDefinitionList.Add(sd);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return splitDefinitionList;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SplitDefinitionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public SplitDefinition(char delimiter, string[] splits)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.delimiter = delimiter;Di2015NewLine        this.splits = splits;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public char delimiter { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string[] splits { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7209660Di2015UniqueSeparatorTimer
7209660Di2015UniqueSeparatorTick
7209660Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ParallelButtons_7208779Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class frmMain : FormDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public frmMain()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tslblRunStatus.Text = "Updating: please wait...";Di2015NewLine            tslblFinalStatus.Text = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Thread BackgroundThread =Di2015NewLine                new Thread(() => TwoParallelCalls_UpdateOnlyOnReturn());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            BackgroundThread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // tmrUpdateStatus is a timer component dropped onto theDi2015NewLine            // form in design mode. it's initial settings are defaultsDi2015NewLine            // Interval=100, Enabled=false, and it's Tick event has Di2015NewLine            // been hooked up to tmrUpdateStatus_tickDi2015NewLine            tmrUpdateStatus.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // the nice thing about the component timer is that we don't Di2015NewLine        // have to worry about doing an Invoke, we already know that theDi2015NewLine        // Tick event is happening on the UI thread.Di2015NewLine        private void tmrUpdateStatus_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // in case a tick fires after both functions completeDi2015NewLine            if ((currentCount == -1) || (allowedCount != 1))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tslblRunStatus.Text =Di2015NewLine                    string.Format(Di2015NewLine                        "[running...] Using {0} of {1}",Di2015NewLine                        runCurrentCount, runAllowedCountDi2015NewLine                    );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // We can use this to stop the timer since we are doing theDi2015NewLine                // check in here. If we didn't need to prevent an extraDi2015NewLine                // update after the functions were complete, we could skipDi2015NewLine                // the check in here and stop it elsewhere. (see below)Di2015NewLine                tmrUpdateStatus.Stop();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The nice thing about having a common method that fires both Di2015NewLine        // functions and then waits for both is that no special threadDi2015NewLine        // synchronization is needed.Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // Otherwise there would be a need to use some sort of Di2015NewLine        // sychronization method (e.g. Semaphore, Mutex, lock) to ensure Di2015NewLine        // that the update is handled correctly.Di2015NewLine        private void TwoParallelCalls_UpdateOnlyOnReturn()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // initializing with Lambdas that just set the fields to theDi2015NewLine            // result of the function calls.Di2015NewLine            Thread thread1 = new Thread(() => currentCount = func1());Di2015NewLine            Thread thread2 = new Thread(() => allowedCount = func2());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // start both threads and wait for both to finishDi2015NewLine            thread1.Start(); Di2015NewLine            thread2.Start();            Di2015NewLine            thread1.Join(); Di2015NewLine            thread2.Join();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // using Invoke to safely update the .Forms GUI component.Di2015NewLine            Invoke((Action)Di2015NewLine                (() => Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // this stops the UI update timer from this function, Di2015NewLine                    // we can do this instead of checking status in theDi2015NewLine                    // Tick event if we can tolerate extra updates.Di2015NewLine                    tmrUpdateStatus.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // set the final status test to the labelDi2015NewLine                    tslblFinalStatus.Text =Di2015NewLine                        string.Format(Di2015NewLine                            "[final] Used {0} of {1}",Di2015NewLine                            currentCount, allowedCountDi2015NewLine                        );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                ));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Background Thread FunctionalityDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The following functions are just dummy methods to udpate somethingDi2015NewLine        // in the background we can use to watch the results on the UI.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // In this section, I just have two methods that run in the backgroundDi2015NewLine        // updating some member fields. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // fields for intermediate values (set internally while running)Di2015NewLine        int runCurrentCount = -1;Di2015NewLine        int runAllowedCount = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // fields for a final result (set externally using return value)Di2015NewLine        int currentCount = -1;Di2015NewLine        int allowedCount = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // holds how long we want the test threads to runDi2015NewLine        TimeSpan TestRunTimespan = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // These methods use the System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch class whichDi2015NewLine        // has been around since .NET 2.0.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If you are really wanting to do a task that requires somethingDi2015NewLine        // to happen at particular intervals, you should probably look atDi2015NewLine        // an interval timer of some sort. There are several timersDi2015NewLine        // available, There are various concerns when choosing one, so Di2015NewLine        // I highly recommend doing research (Stack Overflow has someDi2015NewLine        // good answers on this issue if you search on 'Timer'.)Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // Timers: System.Windows.Forms.Timer, System.Threading.Timer,Di2015NewLine        // System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer, System.Timers.TimerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int func1()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Stopwatch stopWatch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine            stopWatch.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (stopWatch.Elapsed < TestRunTimespan)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                runCurrentCount += 5;Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            runCurrentCount += 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return runCurrentCount;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int func2()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Stopwatch stopWatch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine            stopWatch.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (stopWatch.Elapsed < TestRunTimespan)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                runAllowedCount += 10;Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            runAllowedCount += 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return runAllowedCount;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7209969Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<int> FindIntInByteArray(int match, byte[] array) {Di2015NewLine    if (array.Length < 4) yield break;Di2015NewLine    byte b0 = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte b1 = array[0];Di2015NewLine    byte b2 = array[1];Di2015NewLine    byte b3 = array[2];Di2015NewLine    int len = array.Length;Di2015NewLine    for (int i=3;i<len;i++) {Di2015NewLine        b0 = b1;Di2015NewLine        b1 = b2;Di2015NewLine        b2 = b3;Di2015NewLine        b3 = array[i];Di2015NewLine        /* The following line should be changed depending on endian-ness or whichDi2015NewLine           bytes are to be considered most significant. */Di2015NewLine        int comp = (b0 << 24) | (b1 << 16) | (b2 << 8) | b3;Di2015NewLine        if (comp == match) yield return i-3;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7213748Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static T GetChildByType<T>(this UIElement element, Func<T, bool> condition)Di2015NewLine        where T : UIElementDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<T> results = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        GetChildrenByType<T>(element, condition, results);Di2015NewLine        if (results.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            return results[0];Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void GetChildrenByType<T>(UIElement element, Func<T, bool> condition, List<T> results)Di2015NewLine        where T : UIElementDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(element); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            UIElement child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(element, i) as UIElement;Di2015NewLine            if (child != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T t = child as T;Di2015NewLine                if (t != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (condition == null)Di2015NewLine                        results.Add(t);Di2015NewLine                    else if (condition(t))Di2015NewLine                        results.Add(t);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                GetChildrenByType<T>(child, condition, results);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7217170Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid ChangeSerialNumber(char volume, uint newSerial)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var fsInfo = new[]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new { Name = "FAT32", NameOffs = 0x52, SerialOffs = 0x43 },Di2015NewLine        new { Name = "FAT", NameOffs = 0x36, SerialOffs = 0x27 },Di2015NewLine        new { Name = "NTFS", NameOffs = 0x03, SerialOffs = 0x48 }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var disk = new Disk(volume))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sector = new byte[512];Di2015NewLine        disk.ReadSector(0, sector);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var fs = fsInfo.FirstOrDefault(Di2015NewLine                f => Strncmp(f.Name, sector, f.NameOffs)Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine        if (fs == null) throw new NotSupportedException("This file system is not supported");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var s = newSerial;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i, s >>= 8) sector[fs.SerialOffs + i] = (byte)(s & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        disk.WriteSector(0, sector);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebool Strncmp(string str, byte[] data, int offset)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < str.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (data[i + offset] != (byte)str[i]) return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Disk : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private SafeFileHandle handle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Marshal.ThrowExceptionForHR(Marshal.GetHRForLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        uint read;Di2015NewLine        if (!ReadFile(handle, buffer, buffer.Length, out read, IntPtr.Zero)) Marshal.ThrowExceptionForHR(Marshal.GetHRForLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine        if (read != buffer.Length) throw new IOException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WriteSector(uint sector, byte[] buffer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (buffer == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("buffer");Di2015NewLine        if (SetFilePointer(handle, sector, IntPtr.Zero, EMoveMethod.Begin) == INVALID_SET_FILE_POINTER) Marshal.ThrowExceptionForHR(Marshal.GetHRForLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        uint written;Di2015NewLine        if (!WriteFile(handle, buffer, buffer.Length, out written, IntPtr.Zero)) Marshal.ThrowExceptionForHR(Marshal.GetHRForLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine        if (written != buffer.Length) throw new IOException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine        GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine 7217845Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RC4 {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static byte[] Encrypt(byte[] pwd, byte[] data) {Di2015NewLine    int a, i, j, k, tmp;Di2015NewLine    int[] key, box;Di2015NewLine    byte[] cipher;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    key = new int[256];Di2015NewLine    box = new int[256];Di2015NewLine    cipher = new byte[data.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (i = 0; i < 256; i++) {Di2015NewLine      key[i] = pwd[i % pwd.Length];Di2015NewLine      box[i] = i;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    for (j = i = 0; i < 256; i++) {Di2015NewLine      j = (j + box[i] + key[i]) % 256;Di2015NewLine      tmp = box[i];Di2015NewLine      box[i] = box[j];Di2015NewLine      box[j] = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    for (a = j = i = 0; i < data.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine      a++;Di2015NewLine      a %= 256;Di2015NewLine      j += box[a];Di2015NewLine      j %= 256;Di2015NewLine      tmp = box[a];Di2015NewLine      box[a] = box[j];Di2015NewLine      box[j] = tmp;Di2015NewLine      k = box[((box[a] + box[j]) % 256)];Di2015NewLine      cipher[i] = (byte)(data[i] ^ k);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return cipher;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static byte[] Decrypt(byte[] pwd, byte[] data) {Di2015NewLine    return Encrypt(pwd, data);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7217845Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring data = "This is a test.";Di2015NewLinebyte[] key = { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// encryptDi2015NewLinebyte[] enc = RC4.Encrypt(key, Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(data));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// turn into base64 for convenient transport as form dataDi2015NewLinestring base64 = Convert.ToBase64String(enc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(base64);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// turn back into byte arrayDi2015NewLinebyte[] code = Convert.FromBase64String(base64);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// decryptDi2015NewLinestring dec = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(RC4.Decrypt(key, code));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(dec);Di2015NewLine

7219929Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string RestoreText(string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    var totalLen = 0;Di2015NewLine    var orgIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var pair in _tags.OrderBy(t => t.Key))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var toAdd = text.Substring(orgIndex, pair.Key - totalLen);Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(toAdd);Di2015NewLine        orgIndex += toAdd.Length;Di2015NewLine        totalLen += toAdd.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sb.Append(pair.Value);Di2015NewLine        totalLen += pair.Value.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (orgIndex < text.Length) sb.Append(text.Substring(orgIndex));Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7224270Di2015UniqueSeparator public static class StringExtensionsDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine     public static string Collapse( this string source )Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine          if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace( source ))Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine              return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          var builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine          foreach (char c in source)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine              if (!char.IsWhiteSpace( c ))Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                  builder.Append( c );Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7224534Di2015UniqueSeparatorInterleave
7224534Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static IEnumerable<T> InterleaveEnumerationsOfEqualLength<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> first, Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<T>Di2015NewLine        enumerator1 = first.GetEnumerator(),Di2015NewLine        enumerator2 = second.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (enumerator1.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return enumerator1.Current;Di2015NewLine            if (enumerator2.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                yield return enumerator2.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7227321Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid MyMethod(IFoo f)
7227321Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class FooChains : Dictionary<IFoo, IEnumerable<IFoo>> { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // to manage our foos and their chains. very important foo chains.Di2015NewLine    public class FooManagerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private FooChains myChainList = new FooChains();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // void MyMethod<T>(T f) where T : IFooDi2015NewLine        void CopyAndChainFoo<TFoo>(TFoo fromFoo) where TFoo : IFooDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TFoo toFoo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                // create a foo from the same type of fooDi2015NewLine                toFoo = (TFoo)fromFoo.MakeTyped<TFoo>(EFooOpts.ForChain);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception Ex) {Di2015NewLine                // hey! that wasn't the same type of foo!Di2015NewLine                throw new FooChainTypeMismatch(typeof(TFoo), fromFoo, Ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // a list of a specific type of foos chained to fromFooDi2015NewLine            List<TFoo> typedFoos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!myChainList.Keys.Contains(fromFoo))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // no foos there! make a list and connect them to fromFooDi2015NewLine                typedChain = new List<TFoo>();Di2015NewLine                myChainList.Add(fromFoo, (IEnumerable<IFoo>)typedChain);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                // oh good, the chain exists, phew!Di2015NewLine                typedChain = (List<TFoo>)myChainList[fromFoo];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            add the new foo to the connected chain of foosDi2015NewLine            typedChain.Add(toFoo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // and we're done!Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
7227321Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace IFooedYouOnceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // IFooDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // It's personality is so magnetic, it's erased hard drives.Di2015NewLine    // It can debug other code... by actually debugging other code.Di2015NewLine    // It can speak Haskell... in C. Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // It *is* the most interesting interface in the world.Di2015NewLine    public interface IFooDi2015NewLine    {       Di2015NewLine        // didn't end up using this but it's still there because someDi2015NewLine        // of the supporting derived classes look silly without it.Di2015NewLine        bool CanChain { get; }Di2015NewLine        string FooIdentifier { get; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // would like to place constraints on this in derived methodsDi2015NewLine        // to ensure type safety, but had to use exceptions instead.Di2015NewLine        // Liskov yada yada yada...Di2015NewLine        IFoo MakeTyped<TFoo>(EFooOpts fooOpts);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // using IEnumerable<IFoo> here to take advantage of covariance;Di2015NewLine    // we can have lists of derived foos and just cast back and Di2015NewLine    // forth for adding or if we need to use the derived interfaces.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // made it into a separate class because probably there will beDi2015NewLine    // specific operations you can do on the chain collection as aDi2015NewLine    // whole so this way there's a spot for it instead of, say, Di2015NewLine    // implementing it all in the FooManagerDi2015NewLine    public class FooChains : Dictionary<IFoo, IEnumerable<IFoo>> { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // manages the foos. very highly important foos.Di2015NewLine    public class FooManagerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private FooChains myChainList = new FooChains();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // would perhaps add a new() constraint here to make the Di2015NewLine        // creation a little easier; could drop the whole MakeTypedDi2015NewLine        // method.  but was trying to stick with the interface fromDi2015NewLine        // the question.Di2015NewLine        void CopyAndChainFoo<TFoo>(TFoo fromFoo) where TFoo : IFooDi2015NewLine        // void MyMethod<T>(T f) where T : IFooDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TFoo toFoo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // without generics, I would probably create a factoryDi2015NewLine            // method on one of the base classes that could returnDi2015NewLine            // any type, and pass in a type. other ways are possible,Di2015NewLine            // for instance, having a method which took two IFoos, Di2015NewLine            // fromFoo and toFoo, and handling the Copy elsewhere.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // could have bypassed this try/catch altogether becauseDi2015NewLine            // MakeTyped functions throw if the types are not equal,Di2015NewLine            // but wanted to make it explicit here. also, this givesDi2015NewLine            // a more descriptive error which, in general, I preferDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // MakeTyped<TFoo> was a solution to allowing each TFooDi2015NewLine                // to be in charge of creating its own objectsDi2015NewLine                toFoo = Di2015NewLine                    (TFoo)fromFoo.MakeTyped<TFoo>(EFooOpts.ForChain);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception Ex) {Di2015NewLine                // tried to eliminate the need for this try/catch, butDi2015NewLine                // didn't manage. can't constrain the derived classes'Di2015NewLine                // MakeTyped functions on their own types, and didn'tDi2015NewLine                // want to change the constraints to new() as mentionedDi2015NewLine                throw Di2015NewLine                    new FooChainTypeMismatch(typeof(TFoo), fromFoo, Ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // a list of specific type foos to hold the chainDi2015NewLine            List<TFoo> typedFoos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!myChainList.Keys.Contains(fromFoo))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // we just create a new one and link it to the fromFooDi2015NewLine                // if none already existsDi2015NewLine                typedFoos = new List<TFoo>();Di2015NewLine                myChainList.Add(fromFoo, (IEnumerable<IFoo>)typedFoos);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                // otherwise get the existing one; we are using the Di2015NewLine                // IEnumerable to hold actual List<TFoos> so we can justDi2015NewLine                // cast here.Di2015NewLine                typedFoos = (List<TFoo>)myChainList[fromFoo];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // add it in!Di2015NewLine            typedFoos.Add(toFoo);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [Flags]Di2015NewLine    public enum EFooOptsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ForChain   = 0x01,Di2015NewLine        FullDup    = 0x02,Di2015NewLine        RawCopy    = 0x04,Di2015NewLine        Specialize = 0x08Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // base class, originally so we could have the chainable/Di2015NewLine    // non chainable distinction but that turned out to be Di2015NewLine    // fairly pointless since I didn't use it. so, just leftDi2015NewLine    // it like it was anyway so I didn't have to rework all Di2015NewLine    // the classes again.Di2015NewLine    public abstract class FooBase : IFooDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string FooIdentifier { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLine        public abstract bool CanChain { get; }Di2015NewLine        public abstract IFoo MakeTyped<TFoo>(EFooOpts parOpts);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract class NonChainableFoo : FooBaseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public override bool CanChain { get { return false; } }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract class ChainableFoo : FooBaseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public override bool CanChain { get { return true; } }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // not much more interesting to see here; the MakeTyped wouldDi2015NewLine    // have been nicer not to exist, but that would have requiredDi2015NewLine    // a new() constraint on the chains function.  Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // or would have added "where TFoo : MarkIFoo" type constraintDi2015NewLine    // on the derived classes' implementation of it, but that's not Di2015NewLine    // allowed due to the fact that the constraints have to deriveDi2015NewLine    // from the base method, which had to exist on the abstract Di2015NewLine    // classes to implement IFoo.Di2015NewLine    public class MarkIFoo : NonChainableFooDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public MarkIFoo()Di2015NewLine            { FooIdentifier = "MI_-" + Guid.NewGuid().ToString(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override IFoo MakeTyped<TFoo>(EFooOpts fooOpts) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (typeof(TFoo) != typeof(MarkIFoo))Di2015NewLine                throw new FooCopyTypeMismatch(typeof(TFoo), this, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new MarkIFoo(this, fooOpts);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private MarkIFoo(MarkIFoo fromFoo, EFooOpts parOpts) :Di2015NewLine            this() { /* copy MarkOne foo here */ }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class MarkIIFoo : ChainableFooDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public MarkIIFoo()Di2015NewLine            { FooIdentifier = "MII-" + Guid.NewGuid().ToString(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override IFoo MakeTyped<TFoo>(EFooOpts fooOpts)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (typeof(TFoo) != typeof(MarkIIFoo))Di2015NewLine                throw new FooCopyTypeMismatch(typeof(TFoo), this, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new MarkIIFoo(this, fooOpts);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private MarkIIFoo(MarkIIFoo fromFoo, EFooOpts parOpts) :Di2015NewLine            this() { /* copy MarkTwo foo here */ }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // yep, really, that's about all. Di2015NewLine    public class FooException : ExceptionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Tuple<string, object>[] itemDetail { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public FooException(Di2015NewLine            string message, Exception inner,Di2015NewLine            params Tuple<string, object>[] parItemDetailDi2015NewLine        ) : base(message, inner)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            itemDetail = parItemDetail;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public FooException(Di2015NewLine            string msg, object srcItem, object destType, Exception innerDi2015NewLine        ) : this(msg, inner,Di2015NewLine            Tuple.Create("src", srcItem), Tuple.Create("dtype", destType)Di2015NewLine        ) { }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class FooCopyTypeMismatch : FooExceptionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public FooCopyTypeMismatch(Di2015NewLine            Type reqDestType, IFoo reqFromFoo, Exception innerDi2015NewLine        ) : base("copy type mismatch", reqFromFoo, reqDestType, inner)Di2015NewLine        { }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class FooChainTypeMismatch : FooExceptionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public FooChainTypeMismatch(Di2015NewLine            Type reqDestType, IFoo reqFromFoo, Exception innerDi2015NewLine        ) : base("chain type mismatch", reqFromFoo, reqDestType, inner)Di2015NewLine        { }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// I(Foo) shot J.R.!Di2015NewLine

7230432Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static class UDFsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private const int MAXIT = 100;Di2015NewLine        private const double EPS = 0.0000003;Di2015NewLine        private const double FPMIN = 1.0E-30;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [SqlFunction(Name = "BetaInv", DataAccess = DataAccessKind.Read)]Di2015NewLine        public static SqlDouble BetaInv(SqlDouble p, SqlDouble alpha, SqlDouble beta, SqlDouble A, SqlDouble B)Di2015NewLine        {    Di2015NewLine            return InverseBeta(p.Value, alpha.Value, beta.Value, A.Value, B.Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static double InverseBeta(double p, double alpha, double beta, double A, double B)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double x = 0;Di2015NewLine            double a = 0;Di2015NewLine            double b = 1;Di2015NewLine            double precision = Math.Pow(10, -6); // converge until there is 6 decimal places precisionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while ((b - a) > precision)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                x = (a + b) / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (IncompleteBetaFunction(x, alpha, beta) > p)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    b = x;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    a = x;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ((B > 0) && (A > 0))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                x = x * (B - A) + A;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return x;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static double IncompleteBetaFunction(double x, double a, double b)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double bt = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (x <= 0.0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (x >= 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bt = System.Math.Exp(Gammln(a + b) - Gammln(a) - Gammln(b) + a * System.Math.Log(x) + b * System.Math.Log(1.0 - x));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (x < ((a + 1.0) / (a + b + 2.0)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Use continued fraction directly.Di2015NewLine                return (bt * betacf(a, b, x) / a);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Use continued fraction after making the symmetry transformation.Di2015NewLine                return (1.0 - bt * betacf(b, a, 1.0 - x) / b);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static double betacf(double a, double b, double x)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int m, m2;Di2015NewLine            double aa, c, d, del, h, qab, qam, qap;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            qab = a + b; // These qâs will be used in factors that occur in the coe.cients (6.4.6).Di2015NewLine            qap = a + 1.0;Di2015NewLine            qam = a - 1.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            c = 1.0; // First step of Lentzâs method.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            d = 1.0 - qab * x / qap;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (System.Math.Abs(d) < FPMIN)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                d = FPMIN;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            d = 1.0 / d;Di2015NewLine            h = d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (m = 1; m <= MAXIT; ++m)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m2 = 2 * m;Di2015NewLine                aa = m * (b - m) * x / ((qam + m2) * (a + m2));Di2015NewLine                d = 1.0 + aa * d; //One step (the even one) of the recurrence.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (System.Math.Abs(d) < FPMIN)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    d = FPMIN;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                c = 1.0 + aa / c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (System.Math.Abs(c) < FPMIN)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    c = FPMIN;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                d = 1.0 / d;Di2015NewLine                h *= d * c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                aa = -(a + m) * (qab + m) * x / ((a + m2) * (qap + m2));Di2015NewLine                d = 1.0 + aa * d; // Next step of the recurrence (the odd one).Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (System.Math.Abs(d) < FPMIN)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    d = FPMIN;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                c = 1.0 + aa / c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (System.Math.Abs(c) < FPMIN)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    c = FPMIN;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                d = 1.0 / d;Di2015NewLine                del = d * c;Di2015NewLine                h *= del;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (System.Math.Abs(del - 1.0) < EPS)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Are we done?Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (m > MAXIT)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return h;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static double Gammln(double xx)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double x, y, tmp, ser;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double[] cof = new double[] { 76.180091729471457, -86.505320329416776, 24.014098240830911, -1.231739572450155, 0.001208650973866179, -0.000005395239384953 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            y = xx;Di2015NewLine            x = xx;Di2015NewLine            tmp = x + 5.5;Di2015NewLine            tmp -= (x + 0.5) * System.Math.Log(tmp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ser = 1.0000000001900149;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j <= 5; ++j)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                y += 1;Di2015NewLine                ser += cof[j] / y;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return -tmp + System.Math.Log(2.5066282746310007 * ser / x);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7230446Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach
7230446Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach(var kvp in dict)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    nameValueCollection.Add(kvp.Key.ToString(), kvp.Value.ToString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7230446Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static NameValueCollection ToNameValueCollection<TKey, TValue>(Di2015NewLine    this IDictionary<TKey, TValue> dict)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var nameValueCollection = new NameValueCollection();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var kvp in dict)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string value = null;Di2015NewLine        if(kvp.Value != null)Di2015NewLine            value = kvp.Value.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        nameValueCollection.Add(kvp.Key.ToString(), value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return nameValueCollection;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7232612Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool IsLanIP(IPAddress address)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var ping = new Ping();Di2015NewLine    var rep = ping.Send(address, 100, new byte[] { 1 }, new PingOptions()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DontFragment = true,Di2015NewLine        Ttl = 1Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine    return rep.Status != IPStatus.TtlExpired && rep.Status != IPStatus.TimedOut && rep.Status != IPStatus.TimeExceeded;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7232612Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool IsLanIP(IPAddress address)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var interfaces = NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var iface in interfaces)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var properties = iface.GetIPProperties();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var ifAddr in properties.UnicastAddresses)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (ifAddr.IPv4Mask != null && Di2015NewLine                ifAddr.Address.AddressFamily == AddressFamily.InterNetwork &&Di2015NewLine                CheckMask(ifAddr.Address, ifAddr.IPv4Mask, address))Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool CheckMask(IPAddress address, IPAddress mask, IPAddress target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (mask == null)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var ba = address.GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLine    var bm = mask.GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLine    var bb = target.GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (ba.Length != bm.Length || bm.Length != bb.Length)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < ba.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int m = bm[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int a = ba[i] & m;Di2015NewLine        int b = bb[i] & m;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (a != b)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7235318Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void TextBox_MouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TextBox textBox = sender as TextBox;Di2015NewLine    Point mousePoint = Mouse.GetPosition(textBox);Di2015NewLine    int charPosition = textBox.GetCharacterIndexFromPoint(mousePoint, true);Di2015NewLine    if (charPosition > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        textBox.Focus();Di2015NewLine        int index = 0;Di2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLine        string[] strings = textBox.Text.Split(' ');Di2015NewLine        while (index + strings[i].Length < charPosition && i < strings.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            index += strings[i++].Length + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        textBox.Select(index, strings[i].Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7235888Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class LinqHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T[]> SplitIntoGroups<T>(this IEnumerable<T> items, int N)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (items == null || N < 1)Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        T[] group = new T[N];Di2015NewLine        int size = 0;Di2015NewLine        var iter = items.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (iter.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            group[size++] = iter.Current;Di2015NewLine            if (size == N)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return group;Di2015NewLine                size = 0;Di2015NewLine                group = new T[N];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (size > 0)Di2015NewLine            yield return group.Take(size).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7236395Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AgePair<T, Y>Di2015NewLine    where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine    where Y : IComparable<Y>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T A { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Y B { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class AgeRecordList<T, Y> : IEnumerable<AgePair<T,Y>>Di2015NewLine    where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine    where Y : IComparable<Y> Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<AgePair<T, Y>> m_List = new List<AgePair<T, Y>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(T a, Y b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AgePair<T, Y> newPair = new AgePair<T, Y> { A = a, B = b };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get all elements that are youngerDi2015NewLine        var younger = GetYounger(newPair.A);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find any of the younger with a higher scoreDi2015NewLine        // If found, return without inserting the elementDi2015NewLine        foreach (var v in younger)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (v.B.CompareTo(newPair.B) >= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return; Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Cache elements to delete Di2015NewLine        List<AgePair<T, Y>> toDelete = new List<AgePair<T, Y>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find all the elder elements     Di2015NewLine        var elder = GetElder(newPair.A);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find all elder elements with a lower BDi2015NewLine        foreach (var v in elder)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (v.B.CompareTo(newPair.B) <= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Mark for deleteDi2015NewLine                toDelete.Add(v);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Delete those elements found aboveDi2015NewLine        foreach (var v in toDelete)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_List.Remove(v);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the new elementDi2015NewLine        m_List.Add(newPair);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Sort the list (ascending by A)Di2015NewLine        m_List.Sort(CompareA);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<AgePair<T, Y>> GetElder(T t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<AgePair<T, Y>> result = new List<AgePair<T, Y>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var current in m_List)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (t.CompareTo(current.A) <= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.Add(current);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<AgePair<T, Y>> GetYounger(T t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<AgePair<T, Y>> result = new List<AgePair<T, Y>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var current in m_List)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (t.CompareTo(current.A) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.Add(current);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int CompareA(AgePair<T,Y> item1, AgePair<T,Y> item2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return item1.A.CompareTo(item2.A);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<AgePair<T, Y>> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return m_List.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7242944Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void ShiftElement<T>(this T[] array, int oldIndex, int newIndex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // TODO: Argument validationDi2015NewLine    if (oldIndex == newIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return; // No-opDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    T tmp = array[oldIndex];Di2015NewLine    if (newIndex < oldIndex) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Need to move part of the array "up" to make roomDi2015NewLine        Array.Copy(array, newIndex, array, newIndex + 1, oldIndex - newIndex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Need to move part of the array "down" to fill the gapDi2015NewLine        Array.Copy(array, oldIndex + 1, array, oldIndex, newIndex - oldIndex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    array[newIndex] = tmp;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7244316Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ByteArrayEqualityComparer : IEqualityComparer<byte[]>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static readonly ByteArrayEqualityComparer Default = new ByteArrayEqualityComparer();Di2015NewLine    private ByteArrayEqualityComparer() { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(byte[] x, byte[] y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x == null && y == null)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        if (x == null || y == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        if (x.Length != y.Length)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < x.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            if (x[i] != y[i])Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(byte[] obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null || obj.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        var hashCode = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < obj.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            // Rotate by 3 bits and XOR the new value.Di2015NewLine            hashCode = (hashCode << 3) | (hashCode >> (29)) ^ obj[i];Di2015NewLine        return hashCode;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// ...Di2015NewLinevar hc = ByteArrayEqualityComparer.Default.GetHashCode(data);Di2015NewLine

7245193Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<Data> GetData()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var transaction = Session.BeginTransaction();Di2015NewLine    bool rollback = true;Di2015NewLine    try Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IQuery q = CreateQuery(session);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var result in q.Enumerable())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return ProjectResult(result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        rollback = false;Di2015NewLine        session.Commit();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (rollback)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            transaction.Rollback();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        transaction.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7246637Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid string GetSize(long size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   string postfix = "Bytes";Di2015NewLine   long result = size;Di2015NewLine   if(size >= 1073741824)//more than 1 GBDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      result = size / 1073741824;Di2015NewLine      postfix = "GB";Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   else if(size >= 1048576)//more that 1 MBDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      result = size / 1048576;Di2015NewLine      postfix = "MB";Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   else if(size >= 1024)//more that 1 KBDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      result = size / 1024;Di2015NewLine      postfix = "KB";Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return result.ToString("F1") + " " + postfix;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7248051Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate DateTime RetrieveLinkerTimestamp()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string filePath = System.Reflection.Assembly.GetCallingAssembly().Location;Di2015NewLine    const int c_PeHeaderOffset = 60;Di2015NewLine    const int c_LinkerTimestampOffset = 8;Di2015NewLine    byte[] b = new byte[2048];Di2015NewLine    System.IO.Stream s = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s = new System.IO.FileStream(filePath, System.IO.FileMode.Open, System.IO.FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine        s.Read(b, 0, 2048);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (s != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            s.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int i = System.BitConverter.ToInt32(b, c_PeHeaderOffset);Di2015NewLine    int secondsSince1970 = System.BitConverter.ToInt32(b, i + c_LinkerTimestampOffset);Di2015NewLine    DateTime dt = new DateTime(1970, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine    dt = dt.AddSeconds(secondsSince1970);Di2015NewLine    dt = dt.AddHours(TimeZone.CurrentTimeZone.GetUtcOffset(dt).Hours);Di2015NewLine    return dt;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7251548Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class MyBase {Di2015NewLine    public void Execute() {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(MyString);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Notice that this has no body, because it is abstract. 7251578Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DateTimeHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Tries to parse the given datetime string that is not annotated with a timezone Di2015NewLine    /// information but known to be in the CET/CEST zone and returns a DateTime structDi2015NewLine    /// in UTC (so it can be converted to the devices local time). If it could not be Di2015NewLine    /// parsed, result contains the current date/time in UTC.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static bool TryParseCetCest(string s, string format, IFormatProvider provider, DateTimeStyles style, out DateTime result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Parse datetime, knowing it is in CET/CEST timezone. Parse as universal as we fix it afterwardsDi2015NewLine        if (!DateTime.TryParseExact(s, format, provider, style, out result))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        result = DateTime.SpecifyKind(result, DateTimeKind.Utc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The boundaries of the daylight saving time period in CET and CEST (_not_ in UTC!)Di2015NewLine        // Both DateTime structs are of kind 'Utc', to be able to compare them with the parsing resultDi2015NewLine        DateTime DstStart = LastSundayOf(result.Year, 3).AddHours(2);Di2015NewLine        DateTime DstEnd = LastSundayOf(result.Year, 10).AddHours(3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Are we inside the daylight saving time period?Di2015NewLine        if (DstStart.CompareTo(result) <= 0 && result.CompareTo(DstEnd) < 0)Di2015NewLine            result = result.AddHours(-2); // CEST = UTC+2hDi2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            result = result.AddHours(-1); // CET = UTC+1hDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns the last sunday of the given month and year in UTCDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private static DateTime LastSundayOf(int year, int month)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime firstOfNextMonth = new DateTime(year, month + 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, DateTimeKind.Utc);Di2015NewLine        return firstOfNextMonth.AddDays(firstOfNextMonth.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Sunday ? -7 :Di2015NewLine                                                    (-1 * (int)firstOfNextMonth.DayOfWeek));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7257890Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void RemoveDuplicates(ref List<string> list_lines, ref int Duplicate_Count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Duplicate_Count = 0;Di2015NewLine    List<string> list_lines2 = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    HashSet<string> hash = new HashSet<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string line in list_lines)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] split = line.Split('|');Di2015NewLine        string firstPart = split.Length > 0 ? split[0] : string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (hash.Add(firstPart)) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list_lines2.Add(line);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Duplicate_Count++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    list_lines = list_lines2;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7258693Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// A Polygon object that you will be able to draw.Di2015NewLine/// Animations are being implemented as we speak.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="graphicsDevice">The graphicsdevice from a Game object</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="vertices">The vertices in a clockwise order</param>Di2015NewLinepublic PolygonShape(GraphicsDevice graphicsDevice, VertexPositionColor[] vertices)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    this.graphicsDevice = graphicsDevice;Di2015NewLine    this.vertices = vertices;Di2015NewLine    this.triangulated = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    triangulatedVertices = new VertexPositionColor[vertices.Length * 3];Di2015NewLine    indexes = new int[vertices.Length];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Triangulate the set of VertexPositionColors so it will be drawn correcrly        Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>The triangulated vertices array</returns>}Di2015NewLinepublic VertexPositionColor[] Triangulate()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    calculateCenterPoint();{Di2015NewLine    setupIndexes();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < indexes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        setupDrawableTriangle(indexes[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    triangulated = true;Di2015NewLine    return triangulatedVertices;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Calculate the center point needed for triangulation.Di2015NewLine/// The polygon will be irregular, so this isn't the actual center of the polygonDi2015NewLine/// but it will do for now, as we only need an extra point to make the triangles with</summary>Di2015NewLineprivate void calculateCenterPoint()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float xCount = 0, yCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (VertexPositionColor vertice in vertices)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        xCount += vertice.Position.X;Di2015NewLine        yCount += vertice.Position.Y;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    centerPoint = new Vector3(xCount / vertices.Length, yCount / vertices.Length, 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void setupIndexes()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < triangulatedVertices.Length; i = i + 3)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        indexes[i / 3] = i - 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void setupDrawableTriangle(int index)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    triangulatedVertices[index] = vertices[index / 3]; //No DividedByZeroException?...Di2015NewLine    if (index / 3 != vertices.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine        triangulatedVertices[index + 1] = vertices[(index / 3) + 1];Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        triangulatedVertices[index + 1] = vertices[0];Di2015NewLine    triangulatedVertices[index + 2].Position = centerPoint;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Draw the polygon. If you haven't called Triangulate yet, I wil do it for you.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="effect">The BasicEffect needed for drawing</param>Di2015NewLinepublic void Draw(BasicEffect effect)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!triangulated)Di2015NewLine            Triangulate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        draw(effect);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw exception;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void draw(BasicEffect effect)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    effect.CurrentTechnique.Passes[0].Apply();Di2015NewLine    graphicsDevice.DrawUserPrimitives<VertexPositionColor>(Di2015NewLine        PrimitiveType.TriangleList, triangulatedVertices, 0, vertices.Length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Less than 1 to reduce. More than 1 to magnify.")Di2015NewLine  ]Di2015NewLine  public float ZoomDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    get{return _zoom;}Di2015NewLine    setDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if(value < 0 || value < 0.00001)Di2015NewLine        value = 0.00001f;Di2015NewLine      _zoom = value;Di2015NewLine      UpdateScaleFactor();Di2015NewLine      Invalidate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// Calculates the effective size of the imageDi2015NewLine  ///after zooming and updates the AutoScrollSize accordinglyDi2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  private void UpdateScaleFactor()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if(_image==null)Di2015NewLine      this.AutoScrollMinSize=this.Size;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      this.AutoScrollMinSize=new Size(Di2015NewLine        (int)(this._image.Width*_zoom+0.5f),Di2015NewLine        (int)(this._image.Height*_zoom+0.5f)Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  InterpolationMode _interpolationMode=InterpolationMode.High;Di2015NewLine  [Di2015NewLine  Category("Appearance"),Di2015NewLine _interpolationMode;}Di2015NewLine    set{_interpolationMode=value;}Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  protected override void OnPaintBackground(PaintEventArgs pevent)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // do nothing.Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  protected override void OnPaint(PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    //if no image, don't botherDi2015NewLine    if(_image==null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      base.OnPaintBackground(e);Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Set up a zoom matrixDi2015NewLine    Matrix mx=new Matrix(_zoom, 0, 0, _zoom, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine    //now translate the matrix into position for the scrollbarsDi2015NewLine    mx.Translate(this.AutoScrollPosition.X / _zoom, this.AutoScrollPosition.Y / _zoom);Di2015NewLine    //use the transformDi2015NewLine    e.Graphics.Transform = mx;Di2015NewLine    //and the desired interpolation modeDi2015NewLine    e.Graphics.InterpolationMode = _interpolationMode;Di2015NewLine    //Draw the image ignoring the images resolution settings.Di2015NewLine    e.Graphics.DrawImage(_image, new rectangle(0, 0, this._image.Width, this._image.Height), 0, 0, _image.Width, _image.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine    base.OnPaint(e);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public ZoomPicBox()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    //Double buffer 7261969Di2015UniqueSeparator public class BinaryResponse {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private BinaryReader _rdr;Di2015NewLine        public BinaryResponse(byte[] responseBytes) {Di2015NewLine            _rdr = new BinaryReader(new MemoryStream(responseBytes)); // wrap the byte[] in a BinaryReader to be able to pop the bytes off the topDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected void ParseResponseSection(CountData countData) {Di2015NewLine            countData.quoteCount = _rdr.ReadInt16(); // guessing 64.000 quotes should be enough in one response, the documentation will have the type      Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected void ParseResponseSection(SymbolData symbolData) {Di2015NewLine            symbolData.errorCode = _rdr.ReadByte(); // depending on your format, where is the ErrorCOde in the byte[]? the symbol might be firstDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int symbolLength = _rdr.ReadInt16(); // if it's not written by a .Net WriteString on the other end better to read this count yourelfDi2015NewLine            symbolData.symbol = new string(_rdr.ReadChars(symbolLength)); // read the chars and put into stringDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected void ParseResponseSection(ErrorData errorData) {Di2015NewLine            int errorLenth = _rdr.ReadInt16();Di2015NewLine            errorData.errorText = new string(_rdr.ReadChars(errorLenth));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected void ParseResponseSection(ChartBarData chartBarData) {Di2015NewLine            chartBarData.chartBarCount = _rdr.ReadInt16();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected void ParseResponseSection(ChartBar chartBar) {Di2015NewLine            // check the order with the documentation, also maybe some casting is needed because other types are in the byte[]Di2015NewLine            chartBar.close = _rdr.ReadSingle();Di2015NewLine            chartBar.high = _rdr.ReadSingle();Di2015NewLine            chartBar.low = _rdr.ReadSingle();Di2015NewLine            chartBar.open = _rdr.ReadSingle();Di2015NewLine            chartBar.timestamp = _rdr.ReadInt64();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected void ParseResponseSection(EndingDelimiterSection endingDelimiterSection) {Di2015NewLine            int checkValue = _rdr.ReadInt16();Di2015NewLine            if (checkValue != 12345) throw new InvalidDataException("Corrupt Response! Expecting End Delimiter"); // assert that the end delimiter is some valueDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7267029Di2015UniqueSeparatorArgsList = List<string> ={"0","&&","5"}  // (0&&5)

7268900Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum ColorSectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Red,Di2015NewLine    Green,Di2015NewLine    BlueDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic ColorSection GetColorSection(int rgb)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int r = rgb & 0xFF;Di2015NewLine    int g = (rgb >> 8) & 0xFF;Di2015NewLine    int b = (rgb >> 16) & 0xFF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (r > g && r > b) ? ColorSection.Red : ((g > b) ? ColorSection.Green : ColorSection.Blue);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7268900Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static double GetHue(int rgb)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double result = 0.0;Di2015NewLine        int r = rgb & 0xFF;Di2015NewLine        int g = (rgb >> 8) & 0xFF;Di2015NewLine        int b = (rgb >> 16) & 0xFF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (r != g && g != b)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double red = r / 255.0;Di2015NewLine            double green = g / 255.0;Di2015NewLine            double blue = b / 255.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double max = Math.Max(Math.Max(red, green), blue);Di2015NewLine            double min = Math.Min(Math.Min(red, green), blue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double delta = max - min;Di2015NewLine            if (delta != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (red == max)Di2015NewLine                    result = (green - blue) / delta;Di2015NewLine                else if (green == max)Di2015NewLine                    result = 2 + ((blue - red) / delta);Di2015NewLine                else if (blue == max)Di2015NewLine                    result = 4 + ((red - green) / delta);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                result *= 60.0;Di2015NewLine                if (result < 0)Di2015NewLine                    result += 360.0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
7268900Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int NumberOfSections = 10;Di2015NewLineint section = (int)(GetHue() * NumberOfSections / 360.0);Di2015NewLine
7268900Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static double GetMyHue(int rgb)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (GetHue(rgb) + 180.0) % 360.0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7271989Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Foo<TFirstKey, TSecondKey, TValue> {Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<TFirstKey, List<TValue>> firstDictionaryDi2015NewLine        = new Dictionary<TFirstKey, List<TValue>>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<TSecondKey, List<TValue>> secondDictionaryDi2015NewLine        = new Dictionary<TSecondKey, List<TValue>>();Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<Tuple<TFirstKey, TSecondKey>, TValue> dictionaryDi2015NewLine        = new Dictionary<Tuple<TFirstKey, TSecondKey>, TValue>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<TValue> GetByFirstKey(TFirstKey firstKey) {Di2015NewLine        return this.firstDictionary[firstKey];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<TValue> GetBySecondKey(TSecondKey secondKey) {Di2015NewLine        return this.secondDictionary[secondKey];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TValue GetByKey(TFirstKey firstKey, TSecondKey secondKey) {Di2015NewLine        return this.dictionary[Tuple.Create(firstKey, secondKey)];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(TFirstKey firstKey, TSecondKey secondKey, TValue value) {Di2015NewLine        this.dictionary.Add(Tuple.Create(firstKey, secondKey), value);Di2015NewLine        if(this.firstDictionary.Keys.Contains(firstKey)) {Di2015NewLine            this.firstDictionary[firstKey].Add(value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            this.firstDictionary.Add(firstKey, new List<TValue> { value });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine         if(this.secondDictionary.Keys.Contains(secondKey)) {Di2015NewLine            this.secondDictionary[secondKey].Add(value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            this.secondDictionary.Add(secondKey, new List<TValue> { value });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7273075Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class JsonRequestAttribute : AuthorizeAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*Di2015NewLine     * Di2015NewLine     *   CONFIRM that this is REALLY a JSON request.Di2015NewLine     *   This will mitigate the risk of a CSRF attackDi2015NewLine     *   which masquerades an "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" requestDi2015NewLine     *   as a JSON requestDi2015NewLine     * Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void OnAuthorization(AuthorizationContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         if (!filterContext.HttpContext.Request.ContentType.StartsWith("application/json", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             // This request is masquerading as a JSON request, kill it.Di2015NewLine             JsonResult unauthorizedResult = new JsonResult();Di2015NewLine             unauthorizedResult.Data = "Invalid request";Di2015NewLine             unauthorizedResult.JsonRequestBehavior = JsonRequestBehavior.AllowGet;Di2015NewLine             filterContext.HttpContext.Response.StatusCode = (int)System.Net.HttpStatusCode.BadRequest;Di2015NewLine             filterContext.Result = unauthorizedResult;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7273320Di2015UniqueSeparator    // Keep the observable collection as a field.Di2015NewLine    private ObservableCollection<TracertNode> pTracertNodes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Keep the instance of the running tracert as a field, we need it.Di2015NewLine    private Tracert pTracert;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsTracertRunningDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.pTracert != null; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ObservableCollection<TracertNode> DoTrace(string hostOrIP, int maxHops, int timeOut)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If we are not already running a tracert...Di2015NewLine        if (this.pTracert == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Clear or creates the list of tracert nodes.Di2015NewLine            if (this.pTracertNodes == null)Di2015NewLine                this.pTracertNodes = new ObservableCollection<TracertNode>();Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                this.pTracertNodes.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var tracert = new Tracert();Di2015NewLine            tracert.HostNameOrAddress = hostOrIP;Di2015NewLine            tracert.MaxHops = maxHops;Di2015NewLine            tracert.TimeOut = timeOut;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tracert.NewNodeFound += delegate(Tracert sender, TracertNode newNode)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // This method is called inside Tracert thread.Di2015NewLine                // We need to use synchronization context to execute this method in our main window thread.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SynchronizationContext.Current.Post(delegate(object state)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // This method is called inside window thread.Di2015NewLine                    this.OnTracertNodeFound(this.pTracertNodes, newNode);Di2015NewLine                }, null);Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tracert.TracertCompleted += delegate(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // This method is called inside Tracert thread.Di2015NewLine                // We need to use synchronization context to execute this method in our main window thread.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SynchronizationContext.Current.Post(delegate(object state)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // This method is called inside window thread.Di2015NewLine                    this.OnTracertCompleted();Di2015NewLine                }, null);Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tracert.Trace();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.pTracert = tracert;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return this.pTracertNodes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnTracertCompleted()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Remove tracert object,Di2015NewLine        // we need this to let the garbage collector being able to release that objects.Di2015NewLine        // We need also to allow another traceroute since the previous one completed.Di2015NewLine        this.pTracert = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Windows.MessageBox.Show("TraceRoute completed!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnTracertNodeFound(ObservableCollection<TracertNode> collection, TracertNode newNode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Add our tracert node.Di2015NewLine        collection.Add(newNode);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7279798Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.Sockets;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace UdpProxyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static IPEndPoint m_listenEp = null;Di2015NewLine        public static EndPoint m_connectedClientEp = null;Di2015NewLine        public static IPEndPoint m_sendEp = null;Di2015NewLine        public static Socket m_UdpListenSocket = null;Di2015NewLine        public static Socket m_UdpSendSocket = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Creates Listener UDP ServerDi2015NewLine            m_listenEp = new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Any, 7900);Di2015NewLine            m_UdpListenSocket = new Socket(m_listenEp.Address.AddressFamily, SocketType.Dgram, ProtocolType.Udp);Di2015NewLine            m_UdpListenSocket.Bind(m_listenEp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Connect to zone IP EndPointDi2015NewLine            m_sendEp = new System.Net.IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Parse("REMOTE_IP_GOES_HERE"), 7900);Di2015NewLine            m_connectedClientEp = new System.Net.IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Any, 7900);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] data = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (m_UdpListenSocket.Available > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    int size = m_UdpListenSocket.ReceiveFrom(data, ref m_connectedClientEp); //client to listenerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (m_UdpSendSocket == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Connect to UDP Game Server.Di2015NewLine                        m_UdpSendSocket = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Dgram, ProtocolType.Udp);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    m_UdpSendSocket.SendTo(data, size, SocketFlags.None, m_sendEp); //listener to server.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (m_UdpSendSocket != null && m_UdpSendSocket.Available > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int size = m_UdpSendSocket.Receive(data); //server to client.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    m_UdpListenSocket.SendTo(data, size, SocketFlags.None, m_connectedClientEp); //listnerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Wait for any key to terminate applicationDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7279801Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.Sockets;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace UdpProxyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static IPEndPoint m_listenEp = null;Di2015NewLine        public static EndPoint m_connectedClientEp = null;Di2015NewLine        public static IPEndPoint m_sendEp = null;Di2015NewLine        public static Socket m_UdpListenSocket = null;Di2015NewLine        public static Socket m_UdpSendSocket = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Creates Listener UDP ServerDi2015NewLine            m_listenEp = new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Any, 7900);Di2015NewLine            m_UdpListenSocket = new Socket(m_listenEp.Address.AddressFamily, SocketType.Dgram, ProtocolType.Udp);Di2015NewLine            m_UdpListenSocket.Bind(m_listenEp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Connect to zone IP EndPointDi2015NewLine            m_sendEp = new System.Net.IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Parse("REMOTE_IP_GOES_HERE"), 7900);Di2015NewLine            m_connectedClientEp = new System.Net.IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Any, 7900);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] data = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (m_UdpListenSocket.Available > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    int size = m_UdpListenSocket.ReceiveFrom(data, ref m_connectedClientEp); //client to listenerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (m_UdpSendSocket == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Connect to UDP Game Server.Di2015NewLine                        m_UdpSendSocket = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Dgram, ProtocolType.Udp);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    m_UdpSendSocket.SendTo(data, size, SocketFlags.None, m_sendEp); //listener to server.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (m_UdpSendSocket != null && m_UdpSendSocket.Available > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int size = m_UdpSendSocket.Receive(data); //server to client.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    m_UdpListenSocket.SendTo(data, size, SocketFlags.None, m_connectedClientEp); //listnerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Wait for any key to terminate applicationDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7284326Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing {Di2015NewLine        public Form1()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Form1_Load(object sender, Path.Combine(Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Desktop), "Output.pdf");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(outputFile, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (Document doc = new Document())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (PdfWriter w = PdfWriter.GetInstance(doc, fs))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Open our PDF for writingDi2015NewLine                        //Get the first page of our source PDFDi2015NewLine                        PdfImportedPage importedPage = w.GetImportedPage(r, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Add the Image to the pageDi2015NewLine                        doc.Add(Img);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Close our output PDFDi2015NewLine                        doc.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            this.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
