7285041Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE TABLE Daily(Di2015NewLine    DailyId INT IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED  NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine    Filler CHAR(4000) NULL,Di2015NewLine) Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO Daily VALUES ('');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE TABLE Impressions(Di2015NewLine    ImpressionId INT IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine    DailyId INT NOT NULL CONSTRAINT FK REFERENCES Daily (DailyId), Di2015NewLine    Filler CHAR(4000) NULL,Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/*Execution Plan uses clustered index - There is no NCI*/ Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Impressions VALUES (1,1) Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineALTER TABLE Daily ADD CONSTRAINTDi2015NewLine    UQ_Daily UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED(DailyId) Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/*Execution Plan still use clustered index even after NCI created*/    Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Impressions VALUES (1,1) Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineALTER TABLE Impressions DROP CONSTRAINT FKDi2015NewLineALTER TABLE Impressions  WITH CHECK ADD  CONSTRAINT FK FOREIGN KEY(DailyId)Di2015NewLineREFERENCES Daily (DailyId)    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/*Now Execution Plan now uses non clustered index*/    Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Impressions VALUES (1,1)    Di2015NewLine

7293515Di2015UniqueSeparatorint gcd(int m, int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = m;Di2015NewLine        goto done;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    result = gcd(n, m % n);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedone:Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7293515Di2015UniqueSeparatorgoto
7293515Di2015UniqueSeparatorint gcd(int m, int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestart:Di2015NewLine    if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = m;Di2015NewLine        goto done;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int old_m = m;Di2015NewLine    m = n;Di2015NewLine    n = old_m % n;Di2015NewLine    goto start;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedone:Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7293515Di2015UniqueSeparatorgoto
7293515Di2015UniqueSeparatorgoto
7293515Di2015UniqueSeparatorint gcd(int m, int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = m;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int old_m = m;Di2015NewLine        m = n;Di2015NewLine        n = old_m % n;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7293515Di2015UniqueSeparatorint gcd(int m, int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (n != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int old_m = m;Di2015NewLine        m = n;Di2015NewLine        n = old_m % n;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return m;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7293515Di2015UniqueSeparatorint fac(int x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (x == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return x * fac(x - 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7293515Di2015UniqueSeparatorint fac(int x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (x == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = 1;Di2015NewLine        goto end;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    result = x * fac(x - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineend:Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7293515Di2015UniqueSeparatorint fac(int x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Stack<int> stack = new Stack<int>();Di2015NewLine    int result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestart:Di2015NewLine    if (x == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = 1;Di2015NewLine        goto end;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    stack.Push(x);Di2015NewLine    x = x - 1;Di2015NewLine    goto start;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineend:Di2015NewLine    if (stack.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        x = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        result = x * result;Di2015NewLine        goto end;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7293515Di2015UniqueSeparatorint fac(int x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Stack<int> stack = new Stack<int>();Di2015NewLine    int result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = 1;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        stack.Push(x);Di2015NewLine        x = x - 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (stack.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        x = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        result = x * result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7293515Di2015UniqueSeparatorint fac(int x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Stack<int> stack = new Stack<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (x != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        stack.Push(x);Di2015NewLine        x = x - 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int result = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (stack.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        x = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        result = x * result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

stm.Read(buffer, 0, WpRecType.RecordSize);Di2015NewLine        WpRecType rec = new WpRecType(buffer);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("[{0}] {1}: {2} {3}, {4} {5}", rec.WpIndex, rec.WpName,Di2015NewLine           rec.WpLat, (rec.WpLatDir == 1) ? "N" : "S",Di2015NewLine           rec.WpLon, (rec.WpLonDir == 1) ? "W" : "E");Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass WpRecTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public short WpIndex;Di2015NewLine  public string WpName;Di2015NewLine  public Single WpLat;Di2015NewLine  public Single WpLon;Di2015NewLine  public byte WpLatDir;Di2015NewLine  public byte WpLonDir;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  const int WpNameBytes = 40; // 20 unicode charactersDi2015NewLine  public const int RecordSize = WpNameBytes + 12;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void SerializeInto(byte[] target)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     int position = 0;Di2015NewLine     target.Initialize();Di2015NewLine     BitConverter.GetBytes(WpIndex).CopyTo(target, position);Di2015NewLine     position += 2;Di2015NewLine     System.Text.Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(WpName).CopyTo(target, position);Di2015NewLine     position += WpNameBytes;Di2015NewLine     BitConverter.GetBytes(WpLat).CopyTo(target, position);Di2015NewLine     position += 4;Di2015NewLine     BitConverter.GetBytes(WpLon).CopyTo(target, position);Di2015NewLine     position += 4;Di2015NewLine     target[position++] = WpLatDir;Di2015NewLine     target[position++] = WpLonDir;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void Deserialize(byte[] source)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     int position = 0;Di2015NewLine     WpIndex = BitConverter.ToInt16(source, position);Di2015NewLine     position += 2;Di2015NewLine     WpName = System.Text.Encoding.Unicode.GetString(source, position, WpNameBytes);Di2015NewLine     position += WpNameBytes;Di2015NewLine     WpLat = BitConverter.ToSingle(source, position);Di2015NewLine     position += 4;Di2015NewLine     WpLon = BitConverter.ToSingle(source, position);Di2015NewLine     position += 4;Di2015NewLine     WpLatDir = source[position++];Di2015NewLine     WpLonDir = source[position++];Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public WpRecType()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public WpRecType(byte[] source)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     Deserialize(source);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7296229Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyProxyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly HttpListener listener;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyProxy()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        listener = new HttpListener();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        listener.Prefixes.Add("http://*:8888/");Di2015NewLine        listener.Prefixes.Add("https://*:8889/");Di2015NewLine        listener.Start();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Proxy started, hit enter to stop");Di2015NewLine        listener.BeginGetContext(GetContextCallback, null);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        listener.Stop();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void GetContextCallback(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var context = listener.EndGetContext(result);Di2015NewLine        listener.BeginGetContext(GetContextCallback, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var request = context.Request;Di2015NewLine        var response = context.Response;Di2015NewLine        var url = request.Url;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        UriBuilder builder = new UriBuilder(url);Di2015NewLine        builder.Port = url.Port == 8888 ? 80 : 443;Di2015NewLine        url = builder.Uri;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WebRequest webRequest = WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        webRequest.Proxy = GlobalProxySelection.GetEmptyWebProxy();Di2015NewLine        WebResponse webResponse = webRequest.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        using (Stream reader = webResponse.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (Stream writer = response.OutputStream)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                reader.CopyTo(writer);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7298643Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication15Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RowOrCol[] rows = new RowOrCol[] { Di2015NewLine                new RowOrCol(4, 1),Di2015NewLine                new RowOrCol(5, 1),Di2015NewLine                new RowOrCol(4, 2),Di2015NewLine                new RowOrCol(8, 0),Di2015NewLine                new RowOrCol(3, 2),Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RowOrCol[] cols = new RowOrCol[] { Di2015NewLine                new RowOrCol(5, 1),Di2015NewLine                new RowOrCol(3, 2),Di2015NewLine                new RowOrCol(4, 2),Di2015NewLine                new RowOrCol(5, 1),Di2015NewLine                new RowOrCol(7, 0),Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int[,] table = new int[5, 5];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int solutions = Do(table, rows, cols, 0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Found {0} solutions in {1}ms", solutions, sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static int Do(int[,] table, RowOrCol[] rows, RowOrCol[] cols, int row, int col)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int solutions = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int oldValueRowSum = rows[row].Sum;Di2015NewLine            int oldValueRowZero = rows[row].Zeros;Di2015NewLine            int oldValueColSum = cols[col].Sum;Di2015NewLine            int oldValueColZero = cols[col].Zeros;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int nextCol = col + 1;Di2015NewLine            int nextRow;Di2015NewLine            bool last = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (nextCol == cols.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                nextCol = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                nextRow = row + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (nextRow == rows.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    last = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                nextRow = row;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i <= 3; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                table[row, col] = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (i == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    rows[row].Zeros--;Di2015NewLine                    cols[col].Zeros--;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (rows[row].Zeros < 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (cols[col].Zeros < 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (i == 1)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        rows[row].Zeros++;Di2015NewLine                        cols[col].Zeros++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    rows[row].Sum--;Di2015NewLine                    cols[col].Sum--;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (rows[row].Sum < 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (cols[col].Sum < 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (col == cols.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (rows[row].Sum != 0 || rows[row].Zeros != 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (row == rows.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (cols[col].Sum != 0 || cols[col].Zeros != 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!last)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    solutions += Do(table, rows, cols, nextRow, nextCol);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    solutions++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Found solution:");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    var sums = new int[cols.Length];Di2015NewLine                    var zeross = new int[cols.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    for (int j = 0; j < rows.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        int sum = 0;Di2015NewLine                        int zeros = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        for (int k = 0; k < cols.Length; k++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Console.Write("{0,2} ", table[j, k]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if (table[j, k] == 0)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                zeros++;Di2015NewLine                                zeross[k]++;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                sum += table[j, k];Di2015NewLine                                sums[k] += table[j, k];Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("| Sum {0,2} | Zeros {1}", sum, zeros);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        Debug.Assert(sum == rows[j].OriginalSum);Di2015NewLine                        Debug.Assert(zeros == rows[j].OriginalZeros);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("---------------");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    for (int j = 0; j < cols.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write("{0,2} ", sums[j]);Di2015NewLine                        Debug.Assert(sums[j] == cols[j].OriginalSum);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    for (int j = 0; j < cols.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write("{0,2} ", zeross[j]);Di2015NewLine                        Debug.Assert(zeross[j] == cols[j].OriginalZeros);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // The for cycle was broken at 0. We have to "readjust" the zeros.Di2015NewLine            if (i == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rows[row].Zeros++;Di2015NewLine                cols[col].Zeros++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // The for cycle exited "normally". i is too much big because the true last cycle was at 3.Di2015NewLine            if (i == 4)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                i = 3;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // We readjust the sums.Di2015NewLine            rows[row].Sum += i;Di2015NewLine            cols[col].Sum += i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(oldValueRowSum == rows[row].Sum);Di2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(oldValueRowZero == rows[row].Zeros);Di2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(oldValueColSum == cols[col].Sum);Di2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(oldValueColZero == cols[col].Zeros);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return solutions;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class RowOrColDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public readonly int OriginalSum;Di2015NewLine        public readonly int OriginalZeros;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Sum;Di2015NewLine        public int Zeros;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public RowOrCol(int sum, int zeros)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Sum = this.OriginalSum = sum;Di2015NewLine            this.Zeros = this.OriginalZeros = zeros;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7316576Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool GetIsDescendant(long idChild, long idAncestor, IEnumerable<Employee> employees)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return GetAncestors(idChild, employees).Any(t => t.Id == idAncestor);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic IEnumerable<Employee> GetAncestors(long idEmployee, IEnumerable<Employee> employees)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var employee = employees.SingleOrDefault(e => e.Id == idEmployee);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (employee == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (employee.ParentId.HasValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parent = employees.SingleOrDefault(e => e.Id == employee.ParentId.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (parent == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            employee = parent;Di2015NewLine            yield return parent;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7318734Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class WaitForFileSizesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly object _syncObj = new object();Di2015NewLine    private readonly HashSet<string> Thread _thread;Di2015NewLine    private volatile bool _abort;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void UpdateSize()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _thread = new       {Di2015NewLine            _abort = true;Di2015NewLine            _pEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("A thread timed out.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Total size {0}b.", _totalFileSize);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void GetDirectoryFileSize()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        GetDirectoryFileSizesRecursively(new DirectoryInfo("C:\\\\temp"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _pEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void GetDirectoryFileSizesRecursively(DirectoryInfo dir)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Parallel.ForEach(dir.EnumerateFiles(), f =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_abort)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _pEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Interlocked.Add(ref _totalFileSize, f.Length);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Parallel.ForEach(dir.EnumerateDirectories(), d =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!IsSeen(d))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                GetDirectoryFileSizesRecursively(d);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool IsSeen(DirectoryInfo dir)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_syncObj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!_seenDirectories.Contains(dir.FullName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _seenDirectories.Add(dir.FullName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

} }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool TryInvokeMember(InvokeMemberBinder binder, Di2015NewLine                                         object[] args, Di2015NewLine                                         out object result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (binder.Name.StartsWith("Try"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = this.GetType().InvokeMember(binder.Name.Substring(3),Di2015NewLine                                                     BindingFlags.InvokeMethod, Di2015NewLine                                                     null, Di2015NewLine                                                     this,Di2015NewLine                                                     args);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(ex.InnerException.Message);Di2015NewLine                result = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return base.TryInvokeMember(binder, args, out result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7323223Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Reactive.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class WeakObservationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IObservable<T> ToWeakObservable<T>(this IObservable<T> observable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Observable.Create<T>(observer =>Di2015NewLine            (IDisposable)new DisposableReference(new WeakObserver<T>(observable, observer), observer)Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass DisposableReference : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public DisposableReference(IDisposable InnerDisposable, object Reference)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.InnerDisposable = InnerDisposable;Di2015NewLine        this.Reference = Reference;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IDisposable InnerDisposable;Di2015NewLine    private object Reference;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InnerDisposable.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        Reference = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass WeakObserver<T> : IObserver<T>, IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly WeakReference reference;Di2015NewLine    private readonly IDisposable subscription;Di2015NewLine    private bool disposed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public WeakObserver(IObservable<T> observable, IObserver<T> observer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.reference = new WeakReference(observer);Di2015NewLine        this.subscription = observable.Subscribe(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void OnCompleted()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var observer = (IObserver<T>)this.reference.Target;Di2015NewLine        if (observer != null) observer.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine        else this.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void OnError(Exception error)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var observer = (IObserver<T>)this.reference.Target;Di2015NewLine        if (observer != null) observer.OnError(error);Di2015NewLine        else this.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void OnNext(T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var observer = (IObserver<T>)this.reference.Target;Di2015NewLine        if (observer != null) observer.OnNext(value);Di2015NewLine        else this.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public 7324613Di2015UniqueSeparator   /// <param name="path">your XML file</param>Di2015NewLine    static void printSchema(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var schemaSet = new XmlSchemaInference().InferSchema(XmlReader.Create(path));Di2015NewLine        foreach (var element inDi2015NewLine            schemaSet.Schemas().Cast<XmlSchema>().SelectMany(s => s.Elements.Values.Cast<XmlSchemaElement>()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine(element.Name + " (element)");Di2015NewLine            iterateOverElement(element.Name, element);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void iterateOverElement(string root, XmlSchemaElement element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var complexType = element.ElementSchemaType as XmlSchemaComplexType;Di2015NewLine        if (complexType == null) return;Di2015NewLine        if (complexType.AttributeUses.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var enumerator = complexType.AttributeUses.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine            while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var attribute = (XmlSchemaAttribute)enumerator.Value;Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine(root + "." + attribute.Name + " (attribute)");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var sequence = complexType.ContentTypeParticle as XmlSchemaSequence;Di2015NewLine        if (sequence == null) return;Di2015NewLine        foreach (XmlSchemaElement childElement in sequence.Items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            root += String.Concat(".", childElement.Name);Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine(root + " (element)");Di2015NewLine            // recursionDi2015NewLine            iterateOverElement(root, childElement);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

7325171Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DateTimeRangeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     public DateTime Start { get; set; }Di2015NewLine     public DateTime End { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     public bool Intersects(DateTimeRange test)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         if(this.Start > this.End || test.Start > test.End)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidDateRangeException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         if(this.Start == this.End || test.Start == test.End)Di2015NewLine              return false; // No actual date rangeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         if(this.Start == test.Start || this.End == test.End)Di2015NewLine              return true; // If any set is the same time, then by default there must be some overlap. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         if(this.Start < test.Start)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine              if(this.End > test.Start && this.End < test.End)Di2015NewLine                  return true; // Condition 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              if(this.End > test.End)Di2015NewLine                  return true; // Condition 3Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         elseDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine              if(test.End > this.Start && test.End < this.End)Di2015NewLine                  return true; // Condition 2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              if(test.End > this.End)Di2015NewLine                  return true; // Condition 4Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7326360Di2015UniqueSeparator    IEnumerable<Color> VaryingColors(int seedIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int maxValue = 1 << 24;Di2015NewLine        int index = seedIndex % maxValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte r = 0;Di2015NewLine            byte g = 0;Di2015NewLine            byte b = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 24; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if ((index & (1 << i)) != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    switch (i % 3)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        case 0: r |= (byte)(1 << (23 - i) / 3); break;Di2015NewLine                        case 1: g |= (byte)(1 << (23 - i) / 3); break;Di2015NewLine                        case 2: b |= (byte)(1 << (23 - i) / 3); break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            yield return Color.FromArgb(0xFF, r, g, b);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            index = (index + 1) % maxValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7327876Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void MergeFrom<T>(this object destination, T source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type destinationType = destination.GetType();Di2015NewLine    //in case we are dealing with DTOs or EF objects then exclude the EntityKey as we know it shouldn't be altered once it has been setDi2015NewLine    PropertyInfo[] propertyInfos = source.GetType().GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance).Where(x => !string.Equals(x.Name, "EntityKey", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase)).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var propertyInfo in propertyInfos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo destinationPropertyInfo = destinationType.GetProperty(propertyInfo.Name, BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine        if (destinationPropertyInfo != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (destinationPropertyInfo.CanWrite && propertyInfo.CanRead && (destinationPropertyInfo.PropertyType == propertyInfo.PropertyType))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object o = propertyInfo.GetValue(source, null);Di2015NewLine                destinationPropertyInfo.SetValue(destination, o, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7333024Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class TerminalFileSizeExpression : FileSizeExpressionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override void Interpret(FileSizeContext value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(value.Input.EndsWith(this.ThisPattern()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double amount = double.Parse(value.Input.Replace(this.ThisPattern(),String.Empty));Di2015NewLine            var fileSize = (long)(amount*1024);Di2015NewLine            value.Input = String.Format("{0}{1}",fileSize,this.NextPattern());Di2015NewLine            value.Output = fileSize;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected abstract string ThisPattern();Di2015NewLine    protected abstract string NextPattern();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class KbFileSizeExpression : TerminalFileSizeExpressionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override string ThisPattern(){return "KB";}Di2015NewLine    protected override string NextPattern() { return "bytes"; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class MbFileSizeExpression : TerminalFileSizeExpressionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override string ThisPattern() { return "MB"; }Di2015NewLine    protected override string NextPattern() { return "KB"; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class GbFileSizeExpression : TerminalFileSizeExpressionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override string ThisPattern() { return "GB"; }Di2015NewLine    protected override string NextPattern() { return "MB"; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class TbFileSizeExpression : TerminalFileSizeExpressionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override string ThisPattern() { return "TB"; }Di2015NewLine    protected override string NextPattern() { return "GB"; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7334427Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Shuffle<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, Random rng)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T[] elements = source.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    // Note i > 0 to avoid final pointless iterationDi2015NewLine    for (int i = elements.Length-1; i > 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Swap element "i" with a random earlier element it (or itself)Di2015NewLine        int swapIndex = rng.Next(i + 1);Di2015NewLine        T tmp = elements[i];Di2015NewLine        elements[i] = elements[swapIndex];Di2015NewLine        elements[swapIndex] = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Lazily yield (avoiding aliasing issues etc)Di2015NewLine    foreach (T element in elements)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return element;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7334538Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SemaphoreDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    private int limit = 0;Di2015NewLine    private object locker = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Semaphore(int initialCount, int maximumCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        count = initialCount;Di2015NewLine        limit = maximumCount;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Wait()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (locker)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (count == 0) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Wait(locker);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            count--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryRelease()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (locker)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (count < limit)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                count++;Di2015NewLine                Monitor.PulseAll(locker);Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

        {Di2015NewLine                    return Results;   Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override string private void processMiscEvents(Event eventObj, Session session)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (Message msg in eventObj.GetMessages())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                switch (msg.MessageType.ToString())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case "RequestFailure":Di2015NewLine                        Element reason = msg.GetElement(REASON);Di2015NewLine                        string message = string.Concat("Error: Source-", reason.GetElementAsString(SOURCE),Di2015NewLine                            ", Code-", reason.GetElementAsString(ERROR_CODE), ", category-", reason.GetElementAsString(CATEGORY),Di2015NewLine                            ", desc-", reason.GetElementAsString(DESCRIPTION));Di2015NewLine                        throw new ArgumentException(message);Di2015NewLine                    case "SessionStarted":Di2015NewLine                    case "SessionTerminated":Di2015NewLine                    case "SessionStopped":Di2015NewLine                    case "ServiceOpened":Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private void processRequestDataEvent(Event eventObj, Session session, string[] fields)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine              throw new ArgumentException(message);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        var list = new 7335068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ValidationResult Validate(Sender sender)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!(InitialUsageSettings.zeroed || sender.Equals(btnZero)))Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        return ValidationResult.Error("A");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!(InitialUsageSettings.StandardFilterRun || sender.Equals(btnStandard)))Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        return ValidationResult.Error("Z");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Etc...Di2015NewLine    if (txtOperatorID.Text.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        errors.Add("A");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (cboProject.Text.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        errors.Add("B");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (cboFilterType.Text.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        errors.Add("C");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (cboInstType.Text.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        errors.Add("D");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if(errors.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ValidationResult.Errors(errors);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (txtFilterID.Text.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        errors.Add("E");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (txtLot.Text.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        errors.Add("D");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return errors.Count > 0 Di2015NewLine        ? 7335256Di2015UniqueSeparator//PdfPTable ExampleDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text.pdf;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WindowsFormsApplication2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Form1()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //PDF file to outputDi2015NewLine            string outputFile = Path.Combine(Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Desktop), "Output.pdf");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create a basic stream to write toDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(outputFile, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Create a new PDF documentDi2015NewLine                using (Document doc = new Document())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Bind a the document to the streamDi2015NewLine                    using (PdfWriter w = PdfWriter.GetInstance(doc, fs))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Open our PDF for writingDi2015NewLine                        doc.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Insert a new page into our output PDFDi2015NewLine                        doc.NewPage();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Create a three column tableDi2015NewLine                        PdfPTable t = new PdfPTable(3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Remove the border from the tableDi2015NewLine                        t.DefaultCell.Border = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //For the first row we some extra paddingDi2015NewLine                        t.DefaultCell.PaddingBottom = 10;Di2015NewLine                        t.AddCell("ColumnA");Di2015NewLine                        t.AddCell("ColumnB");Di2015NewLine                        t.AddCell("ColumnC");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Reset the padding for the remaining cellsDi2015NewLine                        t.DefaultCell.PaddingBottom = 0;Di2015NewLine                        t.AddCell("Value1");Di2015NewLine                        t.AddCell("Value1");Di2015NewLine                        t.AddCell("Value1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        t.AddCell("Value2");Di2015NewLine                        t.AddCell("Value2");Di2015NewLine                        t.AddCell("Value2");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Add the table to the documentDi2015NewLine                        doc.Add(t);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Close our output PDFDi2015NewLine                        doc.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            this.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7335256Di2015UniqueSeparator//Paragraph ExampleDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text.pdf;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WindowsFormsApplication2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Form1()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //PDF file to outputDi2015NewLine            string outputFile = Path.Combine(Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Desktop), "Output.pdf");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create a basic stream to write toDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(outputFile, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Create a new PDF documentDi2015NewLine                using (Document doc = new Document())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Bind a the document to the streamDi2015NewLine                    using (PdfWriter w = PdfWriter.GetInstance(doc, fs))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Open our PDF for writingDi2015NewLine                        doc.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Insert a new page into our output PDFDi2015NewLine                        doc.NewPage();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Right-pad each "column" for a total of 20 charactersDi2015NewLine                        string FormatString = "{0,-20}{1,-20}{2,-20}";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Add the first rowDi2015NewLine                        doc.Add(new Paragraph(String.Format(FormatString, "ColumnA", "ColumnB", "ColumnC")));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Add a blank lineDi2015NewLine                        doc.Add(new Paragraph(""));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Add the two data rowsDi2015NewLine                        doc.Add(new Paragraph(String.Format(FormatString, "Value1", "Value1", "Value1")));Di2015NewLine                        doc.Add(new Paragraph(String.Format(FormatString, "Value2", "Value2", "Value2")));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Close our output PDFDi2015NewLine                        doc.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            this.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7346230Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int WRITECOUNT = 32 * 1024 * 1024; // 32 * sizeof(int)MBDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint[] intArr = new int[140 * 1024 * 1024]; // 140 * sizeof(int)MBDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < intArr.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    intArr[i] = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebyte[] byteArr = new byte[WRITECOUNT * sizeof(int)]; // 128MBDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint dataDone = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (Stream fileStream = new FileStream("data.dat", FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLineusing (BinaryWriter writer = new BinaryWriter(fileStream))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (dataDone < intArr.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int dataToWrite = intArr.Length - dataDone;Di2015NewLine        if (dataToWrite > WRITECOUNT) dataToWrite = WRITECOUNT;Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(intArr, dataDone, byteArr, 0, dataToWrite * sizeof(int));Di2015NewLine        writer.Write(byteArr);Di2015NewLine        dataDone += dataToWrite;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7346497Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring comparison= "";Di2015NewLinestring compare1= "";Di2015NewLinestring compare2 = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif ( searchExpression.Body is BinaryExpression ) // Ensure the expression is a comparison..Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ( searchExpression.Body.NodyType == ExpressionType.LessThan )Di2015NewLine        comparison = "SENTBEFORE";Di2015NewLine    else if ( searchExpression.Body.NodyType == ExpressionType.GreaterThan )Di2015NewLine        comparison = "SENTAFTER";Di2015NewLine    else  if ( searchExpression.Body.NodyType == ExpressionType.Equal )Di2015NewLine        comparison = "EQUALS";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Then evaluate the left and right portions.Di2015NewLine    if ( ( searchExpression.Body as BinaryExpression ).Left is MemberExpression )Di2015NewLine         compare1 = ( ( searchExpression.Body as BinaryExpression ).Left as MemberExpression).Member.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ( ( searchExpression.Body as BinaryExpression ).Right is MemberExpression )Di2015NewLine         compare2 = ( ( searchExpression.Body as BinaryExpression ).Right as MemberExpression).Member.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine ( compare1 + " " + comparison + " " + compare2 );Di2015NewLine

7348341Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE PROCEDURE dbo.EnterLoginData(@Username VARCHAR(50), @Password VARCHAR(50),Di2015NewLine                                    @ContactNo INT, @StateName VARCHAR(50)) Di2015NewLineAS BEGIN Di2015NewLine   DECLARE @StateID INTDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   -- check if state already existsDi2015NewLine   IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM dbo.DGState WHERE DG_State = @StateName)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      -- if it exists - retrieve the DG_StateNoDi2015NewLine      SELECT @StateID = DG_StateNoDi2015NewLine      FROM dbo.DGState Di2015NewLine      WHERE DG_State = @StateNameDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   ELSE BEGINDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      -- if it doesn't exists - insert new row Di2015NewLine      INSERT INTO dbo.DG_State(DG_State) VALUES(@StateName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      -- get the newly inserted row's ID using SCOPE_IDENTITY()Di2015NewLine      SELECT @StateID = SCOPE_IDENTITY()Di2015NewLine   ENDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   INSERT INTO Di2015NewLine       dbo.DGRegion(DG_Username, DG_Password, DG_ContactID, DG_StateNo)Di2015NewLine   VALUES(@Username, @Password, @ContactNo, @StateID)Di2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

7348503Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class YourForm : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private Thread WorkerThread;Di2015NewLine  private volatile bool KillThreads = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void YourForm_Closing(object sender, FormClosingEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Do a fast check to see if the worker thread is still running.Di2015NewLine    if (!WorkerThread.Join(0))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      args.Cancel = true; // Cancel the shutdown of the form.Di2015NewLine      KillThreads = true; // Signal worker thread that it should gracefully shutdown.Di2015NewLine      var timer = new System.Timers.Timer();Di2015NewLine      timer.AutoReset = false;Di2015NewLine      timer.SynchronizingObject = this;Di2015NewLine      timer.Interval = 1000;Di2015NewLine      timer.Elapsed = Di2015NewLine        (sender, args) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          // Do a fast check to see if the worker thread is still running.Di2015NewLine          if (WorkerThread.Join(0)) Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            // Reissue the form closing event.Di2015NewLine            Close();Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          elseDi2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            // Keep restarting the timer until the worker thread ends.Di2015NewLine            timer.Start();Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine      timer.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7349360Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class KeyValuePairValueProviderFactory : ValueProviderFactory {Di2015NewLine    public override IValueProvider GetValueProvider(ControllerContext controllerContext) {Di2015NewLine        return new KeyValuePairValueProvider(controllerContext.HttpContext.Request.Path);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private class KeyValuePairValueProvider : IValueProvider {Di2015NewLine        private readonly Dictionary<String,String> _valuesDictionary = new Dictionary<String,String>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool ContainsPrefix(string prefix) {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public KeyValuePairValueProvider(String rawUrl) {Di2015NewLine            // The url have to be in this formatDi2015NewLine            // controller/key=valueDi2015NewLine            // controller/key=value/Di2015NewLine            // controller/key=value?op=1Di2015NewLine            // controller/key=value/?op=1Di2015NewLine            // controller/action/key=valueDi2015NewLine            // controller/action/key=value?op=1Di2015NewLine            // controller/action/key=value/?op=1Di2015NewLine            // controller/action/key=value;key=valueDi2015NewLine            // controller/action/key=value;key=value?op=1Di2015NewLine            // controller/action/key=value;key=value/?op=1Di2015NewLine            String parameters = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // removing the querystringDi2015NewLine            if(rawUrl.Contains("?")){Di2015NewLine                // i split on the ? and take the first partDi2015NewLine                rawUrl = rawUrl.Split('?')[0];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // controller/key=valueDi2015NewLine            // controller/action/key=valueDi2015NewLine            // controller/action/key=value/Di2015NewLine            // controller/action/key=value;key=valueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // check if the url without the querystring contains a = simbolDi2015NewLine            // if yes I proceed into extract parametersDi2015NewLine            if(rawUrl.Contains("=")){Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // removing last slashDi2015NewLine                if (rawUrl.LastIndexOf('/')+1 == rawUrl.Length) {Di2015NewLine                    rawUrl = rawUrl.Remove(rawUrl.LastIndexOf('/'));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int startIndex = rawUrl.LastIndexOf("/")+1;Di2015NewLine                int endIndex = rawUrl.Length;Di2015NewLine                int lenght = endIndex-startIndex;Di2015NewLine                parameters = rawUrl.Substring(startIndex,lenght);Di2015NewLine                String[] pairs = parameters.Split(';');Di2015NewLine                foreach (String pair in pairs) { Di2015NewLine                    String key = pair.Split('=')[0];Di2015NewLine                    String value = pair.Split('=')[1];Di2015NewLine                    _valuesDictionary.Add(key, value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ValueProviderResult GetValue(string key) {Di2015NewLine            if (_valuesDictionary.ContainsKey(key)) {Di2015NewLine                return new ValueProviderResult(Di2015NewLine                    _valuesDictionary[key]Di2015NewLine                    , _valuesDictionary[key]Di2015NewLine                    , CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture);Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7349640Di2015UniqueSeparator[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple = false, Inherited = false)]Di2015NewLineclass AllowedMethodAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public AllowedMethodAttribute(bool methodAllowed)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.AllowedToExecute = methodAllowed;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool AllowedToExecute { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7349640Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void AnotherNotAllowedMethod()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MyDoNotUseMethod();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[AllowedMethod(false)]Di2015NewLineprivate void NotAllowedMethod()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MyDoNotUseMethod();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[AllowedMethod(true)]Di2015NewLineprivate void MyAllowedMethod()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MyDoNotUseMethod();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#region DoNotUseMethod Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void MyDoNotUseMethod()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var callingMethod = new StackFrame(1, true).GetMethod();Di2015NewLine    var allowedMethodAttributes = callingMethod.GetCustomAttributes(typeof (AllowedMethodAttribute), false);Di2015NewLine    if(allowedMethodAttributes.Length == 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var allowedMethodAttribute = allowedMethodAttributes[0] as AllowedMethodAttribute;Di2015NewLine        if(allowedMethodAttribute != null && allowedMethodAttribute.AllowedToExecute)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Execute the method bodyDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(false, callingMethod.Name + " is not allowed to execute this method", Di2015NewLine                "Mark method with AllowedMethod(true) attribute to allow execution of this method");Di2015NewLine            // throw exception if requiredDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(false, callingMethod.Name + " is not allowed to execute this method", Di2015NewLine            "Mark method with AllowedMethod(true) attribute to allow execution of this method");Di2015NewLine        // throw exception if requiredDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLine

7350132Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int getDecimalCount(double dVal, string sVal, string culture)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CultureInfo info = CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo(culture);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get the double value of the string representation, keeping culture in mindDi2015NewLine    double test = Convert.ToDouble(sVal, info);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get the decimal separator the specified cultureDi2015NewLine    char[] sep = info.NumberFormat.NumberDecimalSeparator.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Check to see if the culture-adjusted string is equal to the doubleDi2015NewLine    if (dVal != test)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //The string conversion isn't correct, so throw an exceptionDi2015NewLine        throw new System.ArgumentException("dVal doesn't equal sVal for the specified culture");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Split the string on the separator Di2015NewLine    string[] segments = sVal.Split(sep);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (segments.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Only one segment, so there was not fractional value - return 0Di2015NewLine        case 1:Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        //Two segments, so return the length of the second segmentDi2015NewLine        case 2:Di2015NewLine            return segments[1].Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //More than two segments means it's invalid, so throw an exceptionDi2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Something bad happened!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7350506Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class Extensions  Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Task<XDocument> GetRssDownloadTask(Di2015NewLine        this WebClient client, Uri rssFeedUri)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // task completion source is an object, which has some state.Di2015NewLine        // it gives out the task, which completes, when state turns "completed"Di2015NewLine        // or else it could be canceled or throw an exceptionDi2015NewLine        var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<XDocument>(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // now we subscribe to completed event. depending on event resultDi2015NewLine        // we set TaskCompletionSource state completed, canceled, or errorDi2015NewLine        client.DownloadStringCompleted += (sender, e) => Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                  if(e.Cancelled) Di2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                      tcs.SetCanceled();Di2015NewLine                  }Di2015NewLine                  else if(null != e.Error)Di2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                      tcs.SetException(e.Error);Di2015NewLine                  }Di2015NewLine                  elseDi2015NewLine                  { Di2015NewLine                      tcs.SetResult(XDocument.Parse(e.Result));Di2015NewLine                  }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // now we start asyncronous operationDi2015NewLine        client.DownloadStringAsync(rssFeedUri);Di2015NewLine        // and return the underlying task immediatelyDi2015NewLine        return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7350506Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var client = new WebClient();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    client.GetRssDownloadTask(Di2015NewLine        new Uri("http://blogs.msdn.com/b/ericlippert/rss.aspx"))Di2015NewLine        .ContinueWith( t => {Di2015NewLine            ShowXmlInMyUI(t.Result); // show first result somewhereDi2015NewLine            // start a new task here if you want a chain sequenceDi2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // or start it here if you want to get some rss feeds simultaneouslyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if we had await now, we would add Di2015NewLine    // async keyword to Main method defenition and thenDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    XDocument feedEric = await client.GetRssDownloadTask(Di2015NewLine        new Uri("http://blogs.msdn.com/b/ericlippert/rss.aspx"));Di2015NewLine    XDocument feedJon = await client.GetRssDownloadTask(Di2015NewLine        new Uri("http://feeds.feedburner.com/JonSkeetCodingBlog?format=xml"));Di2015NewLine    // it's chaining - one task starts executing after Di2015NewLine    // another, but it is still asynchronousDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7353690Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Substring(this StringBuilder source, Int32 start, Int32 count, StringBuilder output)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    output.Length = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = start; i < start + count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        output.Append(source[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static int Split(this StringBuilder source, Char delimiter, StringBuilder[] output)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var substringCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    var substringStart = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < source.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source[i] == delimiter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            source.Substring(substringStart, i - substringStart, output[substringCount]);Di2015NewLine            substringCount++;Di2015NewLine            substringStart = i + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (substringStart < source.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        source.Substring(substringStart, source.Length - substringStart, output[substringCount]);Di2015NewLine        substringCount++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return substringCount;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7362224Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class FunctionalExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Func<T, V> Compose<T, U, V>(this Func<U, V> f, Func<T, U> g)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return x => f(g(x));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Func<double, double> Di2015NewLine            f1 = Square,         // Func<double, double> is a delegate type so we have to createDi2015NewLine            g1 = AddOne,         // an instance for both f and gDi2015NewLine            h1 = f1.Compose(g1); // This is a Func<double, double> now, (i.e. h(X) = f(g(x)) )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // To call new function do thisDi2015NewLine        double result1 = h1(5.0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Func<double, double>Di2015NewLine            f2 = x => x*x,       Di2015NewLine            g2 = x => x + 1,       Di2015NewLine            h2 = f2.Compose(g2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // To call new function do thisDi2015NewLine        double result2 = h2(5.0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double Square(double x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return x * x;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double AddOne(double x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return x + 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7362579Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Provide utilities methods related to <see cref="Control"/> objectsDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class ControlUtilitiesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Find the first ancestor of the selected control in the control treeDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TControl">Type of the ancestor to look for</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="control">The control to look for its ancestors</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The first ancestor of the specified type, or null if no ancestor is found.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static TControl FindAncestor<TControl>(this Control control) where TControl : ControlDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (control == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("control");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Control parent = control;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parent = parent.Parent;Di2015NewLine            var candidate = parent as TControl;Di2015NewLine            if (candidate != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return candidate;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } while (parent != null);Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Finds all descendants of a certain type of the specified control.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TControl">The type of descendant controls to look for.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="parent">The parent control where to look into.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>All corresponding descendants</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TControl> FindDescendants<TControl>(this Control parent) where TControl : ControlDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (parent == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("control");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (parent.HasControls())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (Control childControl in parent.Controls)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var candidate = childControl as TControl;Di2015NewLine                if (candidate != null) yield return candidate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var nextLevel in FindDescendants<TControl>(childControl))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return nextLevel;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7364332Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ReplaceFileStream(string strInputFile)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] fileBytes = File.ReadAllBytes(strInputFile);Di2015NewLine    bool modified = false;Di2015NewLine    for(int i=0; i < fileBytes.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (fileByte[i] == 0x0D)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fileBytes[i] = 0x20;Di2015NewLine            modified = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (modified)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        File.WriteAllBytes(strInputFile, fileBytes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7364332Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ReplaceFileStream(string strInputFile)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string tempFile = Path.GetTempFileName();Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using(FileStream input = new FileStream(strInputFile,Di2015NewLine            FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine        using(FileStream output = new FileStream(tempFile,Di2015NewLine            FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write))Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine           bytesRead = input.Read(buffer, 0, 4096);Di2015NewLine           while(bytesRead > 0)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine                for(int i=0; i < bytesRead; ++i)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (buffer[i] == 0x0D)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        buffer[i] = 0x20;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                output.Write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine                bytesRead = input.Read(buffer, 0, 4096);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            output.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        File.Copy(tempFile, strInputFile);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(tempFile))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            File.Delete(tempFile);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
